node.sales_desc: MOOG Problem Solver products incorporate proven design and engineering features for like new steering, ease of installation and longer life. MOOG is the preferred steering and suspension parts brand of professional technicians and NASCAR(R) Crew Chiefs. Problem Solver powdered metal gusher bearing design enables grease to flow through the bearing to the stud for reduced friction and enhanced strength and stability. Problem Solver patented cover plate design allows for tighter tolerances vs traditional cover plate designs, providing a more durable and extended life part. Full ball metal stud provides 360 degrees of smooth, consistent, rotational movement resulting in more responsive steering. Patent pending Sunoloy coated metal bearings provide smooth stud swing technicians and drivers prefer.

node.display_name: Performance Distributor Screamin' Demon Ignition Coil
node.long_desc: Screamin' Demon Ignition Coil;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Enhance the performance of your computer controlled vehicle by replacing the stock coil with our high voltage Coil.ThePerformance Distributor's coils are designed to produce an exceptional spark throughout the entire RPM range with virtually no drop off in power. Stock coils are notorious for spark falling off as the RPM's increase. The higher spark output of our coils has been dyno tested to provide more horsepower and torque over the stock coil.

node.long_desc: Firepower Ignition Kit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Faster starting, smoother running, more power! You will be amazed at the improvement this kit will make in your vehicle. Your rig will start faster, run smoother, and have more power and better fuel economy too. This ignition kit consists of Performance Distributors' LIVE WIRE plug wires, Screamin' Demon coil, brass terminal cap and rotor. The Screamin' Demon coil allows you to run an astounding .065 sparkplug gap, which gives you a much more powerful burn of your fuel mixture yielding increased horsepower and fuel economy.

node.long_desc: DUI Distributor;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is a simple, drop in unit. The coil is inside the cap and the module is inside the distributor. Just run one 12-volt wire to the distributor and you're ready to run! There is also an optional tach hook-up. The D.U.I eliminates ALL of the messy wiring found on stock AMC electronic ignition systems. This really cleans up the engine compartment. Features: internal coil and module, simple one-wire hook-up, custom tailored advance curve, allows for wider plug gaps, instant throttle response, more voltage-no resistor, upper and lower bushings for durability (stock AMC only has 1 bushing), includes 50,000 volt coil and Dyna-module, and easy to find replacement parts.

node.display_name: Performance Distributor Cap and Rotor Kit
node.long_desc: Distributor Cap and Rotor;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Don't cheat your engine out of any firepower available! The cap and rotor are the finest quality made today. This kit offers up to 50% higher dielectric strength and can handle all the voltage available with all Brass Terminals for maximum conductivity. The improved well design in the rotor eliminates burn-through. The material used in this kit has proven to be the ideal resin for caps and rotors to be used in DUI, Duraspark and Breaker Point systems.

node.long_desc: Adapter Wiring Harness;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This Adapter Wiring Harness adapts the Screamin Demon Coil in the Performance Distributors Firepower Ignition Kit to the factory Jeep wiring harness on 1998-99 Jeeps. Works with the Screamin' Demon Coil #P/D31728

node.long_desc: 8-circuit (expandable) control system;High current capabilities (30 amps per circuit) with a maximum 100 amp capacity;Operates on 12VDC or 24VDC;Small footprint: 4.0W x 4.0"L x 1.125"T;Programmable functions for: Dimming, Strobe, Flash and Momentary;Switch linking (create a master switch to control other switches within the same panel);Flexibility to add multiple controller types such as: Touchscreen, HD smart controller, hard rocker switches;Use the Bantam app on a smart phone, tablet or any Bluetooth LE enabled device;Expandable up to 32 circuits that can be controlled with single touchscreen, or infinite number of circuits;Ethernet cable interconnect with a 25' foot distance limitation;Fully programmable via free Bantam app;Current monitoring (via touchscreen and app);Ignition control for two circuits (switches 1 and 2);Safety lock-out for two circuits (switches 1 and 2);California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: sPOD has listened to our valuable customers' feedback and present to you, the sPOD Bantam! The Bantam will save hours of wiring & installation time! It is a small, 8-circuit (expandable) control system that provides a clean (one ethernet cable into the cab!) and safe way to power and control 12/24VDC accessories. Due to the Bantam's small footprint, the placement options are endless! No cutting, fishing wires into the cab or tapping into the vehicles electrical system. It's the perfect over-all solution for all your aftermarket electrical accessories with options unmatched by anyone. Protection against: Over current, over heat, short, reverse polarity protection, and field collapse. Low voltage detection circuit that will monitor battery voltage and shut system, and all accessories attached to it, off when battery voltage drops below 11.2VDC. 16-position terminal block for end user connections (both ground and power). Removable dust cover with spots for legends and port identifications. 8-position input terminal block for controlling outputs (3.3VDC 24VDC inputs).

node.display_name: FOX 3.0 Series Smooth Body Remote Reservoir Shocks

node.sales_desc: The system utilizes automotive grade approved high-power, high-temp, ultra-reliable components with a maximum 100 amp capacity! The sPOD SourceSE is a fully programmable digital CAN-Bus controlled system utilizing state-of-the-art technologies. OEM vehicle specific simple installation hardware, engineered and 100% manufactured in the United States. Features: Fully programmable Digital controlled system. Eight circuits rated @30amps @12.5vdc per circuit that are End-User friendly terminal block for attaching accessories. Expandable (Daisy Chained selectable) to up to 32 circuits with simple plug-n-play features! Low voltage cutoff (LVCO) battery protection circuit has spec voltage cutoff at 11.2 VDC with a two-minute delay before shutting down the SourceSE. This is useful when you have accessories turned on while the vehicle is not running. When the vehicle starts, the accessories can then be used again. The low voltage battery protection circuit can be turned off with the DIP switches. No more worrying about what rated fuse to install! The system will protect from 1.5 amps to 30 amps automatically. The SourceSE incorporates a failsafe self-healing fault protection system. Fuses have been eliminated (for all accessory outputs) and replaced with current-sensing MOSFETs controlled by a microprocessor. This is a great feature for low maintenance and troubleshooting. Two circuits (switches 1 and 2) have the option to be activated by an ignition switched power source (great for accessories that you DO NOT WANT to turn on unless the ignition key is on). These two circuits can be easily changed to this option by a simple DIP switch setting on the SourceSE and running a jumper wire to tap into a fuse that is only activated when the ignition is on. The same two circuits can also be used as High-Beam activated circuits by tapping into the input side of one of the headlight's high-beam circuits. We have taken care of the PWM issue with the headlight circuits. Shield receptacl"

node.sales_desc: Bushwacker is taking Jeep soft tops to the next level with the Trail Armor Soft Top. Thanks to the Bushwacker exclusive Fold-Back/Fold-Forward design, the Trail Armor Soft Top gives easy open air flow to both the front and rear passengers without removing the entire soft top. Easy, one-handed fold-back sunroof operation for front passengers."

node.long_desc: 1 Gallon;Black;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: POR-15 OEM Bed Liner is formulated to provide professional results and performance in a DIY system that can be brushed, rolled or sprayed over correctly prepared surfaces. Surface preparation should include cleaning and surface abrasion using 80 120 grit sandpaper. POR-15 OEM Bed Liner is a water-based, rubberized coating ideal for protecting truck beds, and all other metal, aluminum, fiberglass, and wood surfaces that are exposed to impact and scuff related environments. Formulated with POR-15 rust preventive technologies POR-15 OEM Bed Liner offers superior adhesion, impact resistance, and flexibility, as well as an attractive, textured semi-gloss black finish that provides the ultimate in truck bed protection. POR-15 OEM Bed Liner is UV stable and will resist damage typically caused by exposure to UV. POR-15 OEM Bed Liner is a low-odor product that can be cleaned up with soap and water and does not have a limiting pot life. Any unused product can be resealed in its container and used later for touch-up or on other projects. For the ultimate in protection apply over POR-15 Rust Preventive Coating.

node.sales_desc: POR-15 is a high performance coating designed for application directly on rusted or seasoned metal surfaces. POR-15 is non-porous and seals and protects many surfaces from water, chemicals, salt, and other corrosive contaminants. POR-15 is an effective anti-corrosive and rust preventive coating that offers superior chemical resistance due to its dense, cross-linked molecular composition and non-porous attributes.The secret lies in POR-15's curing process. Most paints dry through evaporation, but POR-15 dries faster when moisture is present. It has the opposite chemistry of ordinary paints. Now add to that POR-15's incredible hardness, toughness, and flexibility and you have a coating that is practically indestructible. POR-15 is great for auto restoration, and protecting valuable equipment against rust and corrosion. You'll be amazed at the toughness!

node.sales_desc: T-Rex is a billet grille manufacturer dedicated to delivering a quality product. T-Rex specializes on a specific market and caters to the needs of the customer. Focused in the design department is in the fit and ease of installation which mean bolt-on billet grilles with less tools and no cutting which in turn equals more productivity. When it comes to manufacturing a quality product, it starts in the design department but it doesn't end there. T-Rex starts with solid stock of aircraft quality T-5 or T-6 billet aluminum rather than extruded aluminum as used by some competitors. Every billet grille is treated to a durable glossy powder-coat. The final stage of manufacturing includes a three-stage polishing and cleaning. The entire process takes place in their Southern California manufacturing facility.

node.long_desc: When you install a crank trigger system, having locked out timing may put a strain on the starter and flywheel. This compact controller provides a retard that automatically retards the timing during cranking to ease the pressure. The MSD Starter Saver measures only 1.5 inch X 3.5 inch X 2 inch and wires into your ignition system with only four wires. It can be programmed to retard the tim?ing 10? or 20? during cranking only. The retard is activated when the engine begins cranking and is deactivated once the engine reaches over 800 rpm.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: When you install a crank trigger system, having locked out timing may put a strain on the starter and flywheel. This compact controller provides a retard that automatically retards the timing during cranking to ease the pressure. The MSD Starter Saver measures only 1.5 inch X 3.5 inch X 2 inch and wires into your ignition system with only four wires. It can be programmed to retard the tim?ing 10? or 20? during cranking only. The retard is activated when the engine begins cranking and is deactivated once the engine reaches over 800 rpm.

node.long_desc: aFe Power DFS780 Series Donaldson Fuel Filter;Direct OE Replacement;California Residents: WARNING"

For a long time, racers have known that one of the best things to do to an engine to improve its performance is to stabilize the ignition timing. The MSD Flying Magnet Crank Trigger system does exactly that by using four magnets embedded in an aluminum wheel. The MSD Flying Magnet Crank Trigger uses four magnets secured in the aluminum trigger wheel that pass by a stationary non-magnetic pick-up to trigger the ignition. This ??flying magnet inch design produces accurate trigger signals and the non-magnetic pick-up cannot be false triggered.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: For a long time, racers have known that one of the best things to do to an engine to improve its performance is to stabilize the ignition timing. The MSD Flying Magnet Crank Trigger system does exactly that by using four magnets embedded in an aluminum wheel. The MSD Flying Magnet Crank Trigger uses four magnets secured in the aluminum trigger wheel that pass by a stationary non-magnetic pick-up to trigger the ignition. This ??flying magnet inch design produces accurate trigger signals and the non-magnetic pick-up cannot be false triggered.

node.long_desc: Are you looking for an RPM Switch that will turn a circuit on, then off at a different rpm? How about one for your late model coil-per-cylinder ignition system? Or, something for your car with dual coil packs? Maybe one for a Viper or even a Harley Davidson? Look no further, our new Digital RPM Window Switch will do it all!This Switch will accept an input rpm signal from a coil negative terminal (for stock ignitions), a tach output from an ignition control, an ECU tach output or even a 5 volt tach signal. Another great feature is that no rpm modules are needed! The rpm activation points are programmed by simply scrolling through the LED display to your desired rpm amounts.The switch has two outputs; one Normally Open, the other is Normally Closed. It can be programmed from 200 rpm to 15,000 rpm in 100 rpm increments. It can be used with an input voltage of 9-18 volts.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Are you looking for an RPM Switch that will turn a circuit on, then off at a different rpm? How about one for your late model coil-per-cylinder ignition system? Or, something for your car with dual coil packs? Maybe one for a Viper or even a Harley Davidson? Look no further, our new Digital RPM Window Switch will do it all!This Switch will accept an input rpm signal from a coil negative terminal (for stock ignitions), a tach output from an ignition control, an ECU tach output or even a 5 volt tach signal. Another great feature is that no rpm modules are needed! The rpm activation points are programmed by simply scrolling through the LED display to your desired rpm amounts.The switch has two outputs; one Normally Open, the other is Normally Closed. It can be programmed from 200 rpm to 15,000 rpm in 100 rpm increments. It can be used with an input voltage of 9-18 volts.

node.long_desc: This is our most popular performance distributor! The housing is machined from a billet of 6061-T6 aluminum on a state-of-the-art CNC machine producing exact tolerances. For high rpm stability, a .500 inch steel shaft is supported by a sealed ball bearing and a long sintered bushing. This shaft also receives a QPQ coating for friction reduction and resistance to corrosion. A precision machined reluctor is attached to the shaft which triggers the magnetic pick-up mounted in the housing. This high output magnetic pick-up is the most accurate way to trigger your ignition. Plus, with no moving parts to wear or adjust, the pick-up is maintenancefree! Just above the pick-up is MSD?s adjustable mechanical advance assembly. Different springs and stop bushings are supplied so you can tune an advance curve to match your application.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: The Pro-Billet Ready-to-Run distributor is the perfect upgrade for outdated points distributors or bulky HEIs. Simply install the distributor in the engine, connect three wires, the coil and fire it up! A maintenance-free magnetic pick-up accurately triggers the module. The increased output of the amplifier easily outperforms stock ignitions and will smooth out the engine?s idle, improve starting and provide a much higher rpm range. The Ready-to-Run features MSD?s adjustable mechanical advance which allows you to custom tailor an ignition curve to match your engine?s needs. There is also a vacuum advance canister to help improve economy. For positive street performance, the Ready-to-Run is the best choice.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Pro-Billet Ready-to-Run distributor is the perfect upgrade for outdated points distributors or bulky HEIs. Simply install the distributor in the engine, connect three wires, the coil and fire it up! A maintenance-free magnetic pick-up accurately triggers the module. The increased output of the amplifier easily outperforms stock ignitions and will smooth out the engine?s idle, improve starting and provide a much higher rpm range. The Ready-to-Run features MSD?s adjustable mechanical advance which allows you to custom tailor an ignition curve to match your engine?s needs. There is also a vacuum advance canister to help improve economy. For positive street performance, the Ready-to-Run is the best choice.

node.long_desc: All MSD Extra Duty Distributor Caps and rotors are designed with performance in mind and are molded from high quality DuPont Rynite voltage insulating material. MSD uses low resistance brass terminals for maximum power transfer and durability.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Leave it to MSD to build an all-out performance distributor to replace the OEM GM LT1 Optispark! We machine an entire billet block of aluminum down into a precise housing that fits in place of the factory piece. Then, we fill it with a reliable new pick-up assembly, a trick timing adjustment mechanism and top it off with an all new MSD distributor cap! The pick-up is an advanced optical encoder, a different style of optical pickup than the OEM. This type of pick-up has proven to be very reliable and stable through extreme rpm and conditions. The rotor is bolted to a drive assembly that is indexed to the shaft and is stabilized through the use of a large ball bearing assembly. Once installed, you have the ability to adjust the ignition timing ? the only distributor that offers timing adjustability! An adjustment screw allows the timing to be tweaked up to +/-5?. The distributor is equipped with a fresh air vent and has an extra thick mounting surface for the cap to eliminate leaks. The distributor is supplied complete with our heavy duty LT1 Cap, Rotor and the components required for installation.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Leave it to MSD to build an all-out performance distributor to replace the OEM GM LT1 Optispark! We machine an entire billet block of aluminum down into a precise housing that fits in place of the factory piece. Then, we fill it with a reliable new pick-up assembly, a trick timing adjustment mechanism and top it off with an all new MSD distributor cap! The pick-up is an advanced optical encoder, a different style of optical pickup than the OEM. This type of pick-up has proven to be very reliable and stable through extreme rpm and conditions. The rotor is bolted to a drive assembly that is indexed to the shaft and is stabilized through the use of a large ball bearing assembly. Once installed, you have the ability to adjust the ignition timing ? the only distributor that offers timing adjustability! An adjustment screw allows the timing to be tweaked up to +/-5?. The distributor is equipped with a fresh air vent and has an extra thick mounting surface for the cap to eliminate leaks. The distributor is supplied complete with our heavy duty LT1 Cap, Rotor and the components required for installation.

node.display_name: MSD HVC Pro Power-2 Ignition Coil
node.long_desc: If you are looking to upgrade your stock coil, or want to compliment the performance of your MSD Blaster Ignition, MSD 5, 6 or 7, the Blaster Coil line is the right choice. All of the Blaster Coils are designed for improved spark output! Special 100:1 windings are used to provide maximum build-up of voltage! These windings are held secure and kept cool in an oil filled metal canister. The tower assembly is molded of durable alkyd material due to its high dielectric characteristics while wide spaced brass primary terminals prevent the possibility of spark. There are several versions of the Blaster Coil available. All of them have the same internal specifications, but have different housings or components. Each Blaster Coil can be used with a stock ignition.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc:
Baja racers know the Hella Rallye 4000 Lights are the most durable lights on the planet. Designed for use by motor sports professionals, these lights feature high-output 100 watt H1 bulbs, metal housings, glass lenses, and large knurled adjustment knobs for fast aiming. Utilizing Free Form Reflector technology, which distributes the light from the reflector alone and not the lens, these lights produce up to three times more illumination than ordinary lights. Matte black powder coat finish. Lights are sold individually and include a Hella logo light cover and mounting hardware. Rallye 4000 Lights DO NOT include a wiring harness. For best possible installation, please purchase Hella Wiring Harness separately.

Lights sold individually.

node.display_name: K&N Typhoon Complete Cold Air Induction Kits
node.long_desc: The K&N 69-7063TTK Typhoon air intake system is a free-flowing, mandrel-bent aluminum tube air induction system designed to fit some Nissan Pathfinder, Altima, QX60 and JX35 models. The restrictive factory air filter and air intake housing are replaced by the K&N Typhoon air intake which is designed to dramatically reduce air flow restriction as it smoothes and straightens air flow. This allows your engine to inhale a larger amount of air than the factory air intake. More air means more usable power and acceleration throughout the engine?s RPM range. The 69-7063TTK air intake comes with a chrome topped K&N high-flow air filter and a heat shield that installs into the previous air box space. Air is directed through the intake tube into the engine?s throttle body for a guaranteed power gain. The intake tube has an attractive black powder-coat finish thats made to last and it accommodates the factory mass air sensor and crank case vent hose. The oversized cone shaped air filter can be used for up to 100,000 miles before servicing is needed depending on driving conditions. This air intake is relatively easy to install usually in 90 minutes or less using existing factory mounting points.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The K&N 69-7063TTK Typhoon air intake system is a free-flowing, mandrel-bent aluminum tube air induction system designed to fit some Nissan Pathfinder, Altima, QX60 and JX35 models. Air is directed through the intake tube into the engine?s throttle body for a guaranteed power gain. The intake tube has an attractive black powder-coat finish thats made to last and it accommodates the factory mass air sensor and crank case vent hose. The oversized cone shaped air filter can be used for up to 100,000 miles before servicing is needed depending on driving conditions. This air intake is relatively easy to install usually in 90 minutes or less using existing factory mounting points.

This is a perfect compliment to any long travel suspension and is designed to be used with hi-steer type arms on Dana 60's, 44's or 30's. node.long_desc: GenRight Off Road's Tube Fenders for your Jeep TJ/LJ set the bar high when it comes to durability, functionality, and aesthetics;Trail Tested, and Race Proven, these fenders will handle anything you can throw at them;Available in 0, 4, and 6 inch flares, and Standard or Hi-Fender;Choose from heavy duty Steel, or light weight Aluminum, both of which can be painted, powdercoated, or left raw;Built from tough 1-1/2 inch diameter x .120 inch wall thick tubing and 1/8 inch thick steel plate;Made in the USA.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The unique tapered design is shaped more like the standard TJ plastic flare for a more esthetically pleasing look but trail tough function. Built from tough 1-1/2 diameter x .120 wall thick tubing and then topped with 1/8" thick steel plate, these flares will let you bash your way through your favorite trail obstacles. They will provide 3.5" of coverage on your Wrangler or CJ. Opens fender up to fit up to a 40" tire. These fenders can be both welded to the Jeep or bolted on. Requires modifications to body."

node.long_desc: Laser cut from 1/4 inch;Relding Required;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is the GenRight Frame side Trac Bar Mounting Bracket Kit specifically designed for the Jeep YJ & CJ. This is the same design we have reliably run on our GenRight Jeeps for years! Sold as a weld-on kit. This kit requires cutting off the stock trac bar mount and welding on this new mount. A trac bar between the frame and front axle are required, before use. (Axle side bracket FSM1003, sold separately). Designed to work with our 3 link but can be adapted to work with just about anything. Once installed, you MUST cycle the front suspension and steering (in all possible combinations & directions) to make sure NONE of the steering or suspension components will bind or otherwise collide with eachother. DO NOT exceed the range of motion which would damage the steering or suspension components and could cause a failure resulting in a loss of steering control!

node.display_name: Reese Fifth Airborne Extended Wide Air Ride
node.long_desc: Your Fifth Wheel takes a lot of abuse from turbulence caused by potholes, section dividers, bridge decks and heavily worn interstate highways. The 5th Airborne premium fifth-wheel air-ride coupler acts as a buffer between the tow vehicle and the trailer, minimizing the challenges in the road. This significantly reduces the negative impact of vertical shock and longitudinal chucking. The 5th Airborne does more than improve your ride; it protects your investments by relieving stress on your coach?s frame, cabinets, mechanicals, and support mechanisms. Reduced vibration also saves your contents. Furniture, appliances, TVs, computers, dishes, glassware and other fragile items stay in their places. Drivers and passengers also benefit from reduced fatigue and the improved safety provided by the 5th Airborne?s smooth ride.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: When it comes to gettin' her done, gettin' it from A to B, or just gettin' up to go, your truck is beyond question. But even the mightiest rig on the road can be rendered defenseless when a bad storm hits, or some unscrupulous individuals lay eyes on your precious payload. Keep your cargo from a good soaking and shut the door on sticky-fingered thieves with the Pace Edwards UltraGroove Tonneau Cover.Not only has this high-quality aftermarket tonneau has been durably constructed and reinforced with aluminum slats to ensure stability over time, but the makers saw fit to cover those slats with a completely weather-resistant, padded ArmorTeck vinyl laminate in matte-black. When you need to access your gear, the Pace Edwards UltraGroove Truck Bed Cover retracts easily into the canister head at the front of the bed just turn the lock knob and draw it back however far you deem fit.

node.display_name: GenRight Coil Over Shock Hoop Kit
node.long_desc: Universal Mount;Bare steel (unpainted);Made from heavy-duty .120 inch thick wall tubing;Includes crossbar to attach hoops;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is the Gen-Right inchPremium inch coilover shock mount kit for the Front or Rear of a Jeep TJ, LJ, YJ or CJ (Toyota, Suzuki, etc.) that is made in the popular inchhoop inch style which pushes the upper shock mount all the way up just under the hood. This will also allow you to run super long travel shocks and maintain a reasonable ride height and proper shock mounting for the best possible performance. Our kit is designed to work with 2 inch diameter coilovers (of any brand) or 2.5 inch Air shocks in 12 inch, 14 inch or 16 inch travel. This builder?s kit is the most universal on the market and can be cut and mounted in any position to best work with your particular Jeeps Engine & Suspension combination. Additionally, the compact hoop size is ideal for fitting inside the inner fender well, INSIDE the engine compartment with just a small hole up through the top of the fender well for the shock to poke up through to the upper mount. This is a great option when pushing your front axle forward (about 2+ inch) to get to the Magic 100 inch wheel base! This is a clean way to convert over (a leaf or coil spring vehicle) to coilover shocks and get that racing tubed out look! For the TJ or LJ guys, this kit allows you cut off and remove all the factory upper spring mount/bump stop bucket from the frame. This is perfect for placing the shock in virtually the optimal position for dampening performance and articulation. For you CJ or YJ guys who are not ready to convert the entire front end over to coilovers, this can also be a great way to upgrade just the upper shock mount and convert over to shock inchhoops inch from the ugly stock mounts and install longer travel shocks and still keep the leaf springs. These mounts are made from heavy duty .120 inch thick wall tubing and include a crossbar to connect the two shock towers (over the engine) for maximum strength. This kit or the parts from this kit can also be modified and used on the rear for those guys looking to put c

node.display_name: GenRight Coil Over Shock Mount Kit
node.long_desc: Universal Jeep mount;Bare steel (unpainted);Frenched into the side of the frame;3/16 inch steel design;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
This is a rear shock mount kit that is a perfect match for stretching your wheelbase with Gen Right?s inchStretch inch EXT & COMP tanks.

Instead of moving the coil spring mount and figuring out where to re-mount the shock, we recommend this total solution!

It can be used with coilover's or regular shocks and is VERY clean. This simple design is inchfrenched inch into the side of the rear frame section and will allow you to still keep the back seat. Plus you get more clearance for the exhaust AND the shock is in virtually the optimal position for dampening performance and articulation.

These mounts are universal and can be cut or trimmed to be mounted in any position. Lower mounts are welded onto the back of the housing near the brake caliper and do not hang down!

We only offer 1 size to fit all applications that can be trimmed to fit from 8 inch to 16 inch travel shocks and are perfect for most vehicles.

Can be used with stock or after market bump stops. Compatible with most body lifts 2 inch or less.

node.long_desc: Complete Roll Bars;Weld In;Replaces Stock Bars;Kit ties all the way to the floor and still allows you to use factory hard doors;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is a complete replacement roll bar kit for your Jeep YJ. It was carefully designed for maximum foot room and visibility, to fit with a factory hard or soft top. Yes, it has head room for passengers to ride in the back seat too! It is made from heavy wall 1-3/4 inch D.O.M. (Drawn Over Mandrel) seamless tubing and includes all new heavy duty 3/16 inch thick brackets to mount the bars to your Jeeps tub and provide maximum protection to you and your passengers in the event of a roll over. Kit includes new bungs to mount the factory seat belts (if you choose to re-use factory type seat belts).

node.long_desc: GenRight Off Road Corner Guards are a perfect upgrade to better protect your Jeep's tub;The 90 degree bend is formed with a single hit" die on a CNC press brake to assure the corner guard matches the shape of your Jeep;Gen Right's Corner Guards mounting holes are pre-drilled and countersunk with large 5/16 inch stainless steel bolts;Made 100% in the USA and available in Steel or Aluminum, standard or stretched wheelbase there is a Gen Right Off Road Corner Guard to suit your needs;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
GenRight Off Roads Corner Guards are a great way to cover up trail damage, protect the factory sheet metal in the rear of your Jeep, or simply upgrade your corner protection. The heavy duty 1/8 inch steel is formed to match the factory body. Constructed from Steel or Aluminum, the Gen Right Corner Guards are available in a standard or stretched wheelbase, with or without cutouts. Corner Guard Blanks are also available for the guy who wants to cut all his own holes, wheel openings to create a custom and unique look.

Gen Right Corner Guards are available in a Shorty or Full Coverage style and made 100% in the USA.

node.long_desc: Bare steel;3/16 inch high-strength steel plate;Effectively sandwiches the rear upper body panel between the corner guard and this backing plate;To keep dirt and debris out from between the body and the corner guards;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is used in place of large fender washers on the inside of the tub to pull the body flat up against the top of the corner guard, to keep dirt and debris out from between the body and the corner guard. Effectively sandwiching the rear body panel between the corner guard and this backing plate.

node.long_desc: Axle Bridge; Welded & Unwelded;Sold As; Single;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you are triangulating the rear of your Jeep, you will need a truss above the differential housing. This kit will allow you to mount the upper rear comtrol arms to your Chevy 14 Bolt axle. Design puts the joints 8-1/2 inch above axle center line. The t mount is made 2-5/8 inch wide and for a 9/16 inch bolt.

node.long_desc: Heavy Duty 1/4 and 3/16 inch Laser Cut and CNC bent mounts and brackets;Super tough 2 inch diameter and 1/4 inch wall D.O.M. Control Arm Tubing can be cut to desired length;Includes Front Trac Bar;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This Front 3 Link kit is perfect for the do-it-yourselfer. This kit includes super tough 2 inch diameter and 1/4 inch wall D.O.M. Control Arm Tubing that can be cut to desired length. GenRight has pulled together all top notch parts and figured out all the mounting points for proper geometry to make your rig a top notch crawler with awesome articulation and a balanced feel. Simply put, if you were building a rock buggy this is the type of suspension you would put on it,it is that good! This front kit is also perfect for moving the front axle forward to accommodate bigger tires and longer wheel travel. It can also help you achieve the Magic 100 inch + wheelbase (when used in combination with the rear kit we offer, which uses our EXT or COMP gas tanks, to move the rear axle back, also) to improve your rigs departure angle. For those guys converting from leafs, better approach angle, no axle wrap, smooth non binding articulation and better steering geometry,to eliminate bump steer.

node.long_desc: Heavy Duty 1/4 and 3/16 inch thick laser cut and CNC bent frame side control arm mounts.;Laser cut and CNC bent upper and lower control arm mounts for the rear axle.;2 inch x .120 thick wall DOM tubing for the lower control arm;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: GenRight has figured out all the mounting points for proper geometry (weight transfer, rear steer and minimal anti-squat, etc.) to make your rig a top notch crawler with awesome articulation AND handle great on the street too! The main frame control arm mounts are pre-welded to a inchC inch section of steel to beef up the frame and help distribute the load. You simply slip each mount over the frame and weld them in place! The kit is designed to attach to the frame next to your stock (or aftermarket) transfer case skid plate. This rear kit is also perfect for moving your rear axle back, stretching your wheelbase to the Magic 100 inch+ when used with our EXT or COMP gas tanks. For you guys converting from leaf springs, you can say goodbye to axle wrap and all the issues associated with it! It will be power to the ground and high clearance from now on.

node.display_name: Flowmaster Exhaust Scavenger Series Elite Long Tube Header
node.long_desc: These high quality headers are manufactured from stainless steel and are ceramic coat for maximum durability. They feature 1-5/8 in. primary tubes, 3/8 in. thick flanges and incorporate Flowmaster's popular 3 in. ball flange collector connections ensuring a leak free installation. Designed for an easy fit these headers include gaskets and necessary hardware for easy installation. Fits D port cylinder heads including ZZ4 crate engines. Does not fit 1967 to 1969 Camaro's with air conditioning. Will fit most angle plug heads including factory Chevrolet bow tie heads. Requires removal or modification of locking steering columns if equipped. Installation requires new left side air conditioning bracket. For 1979 and later vehicles with short compressors the stock bracket can be used;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These high quality headers are manufactured from stainless steel and are ceramic coated for maximum durability. They feature 1-5/8 in. primary tubes, 3/8 in. thick flanges and incorporate Flowmaster's popular 3 in. ball flange collector connections ensuring a leak free installation. Designed for an easy fit these headers include gaskets and necessary hardware for easy installation. Fits D port cylinder heads including ZZ4 crate engines. node.display_name: Flowmaster Exhaust Outlaw II Race Muffler
node.long_desc: To address the increasing number of tracks around the country that are coming under pressure to regulate sound emissions, the Flowmaster Engineering team went to the drawing board with three goals; Maximum power, Maximum decibel reduction and Minimal weight. This exciting new line of race mufflers is the result of literally decades of Flowmaster involvement in the racing industry and were truly born at the track! Suited to all forms of motorsports where space and weight is a concern while still delivering maximum power. They are surprisingly quiet; netting a reduction of approximately 8-10 decibels over open headers and can be run with a turndown for even further noise reduction. Can be used on methanol or gas engines and/or, as an addition to an existing exhaust system for further sound reduction without a loss of power.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Bushwacker Boss Pocket Style Fender Flares
node.long_desc: Installs easily with no drilling required;Smooth finish;Paintable;100% UV protected Dura-Flex 2000 - no chalking;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
With their surface-mounted stainless steel bolts and massive presence, Boss Pocket Style Fender Flares are a Bushwacker exclusive. Despite their aggressive bolt-on styling, Boss Pocket Style Fender Flares install in minutes, with no body-side drilling. They're custom-designed for your Truck to complement oversized tires and high-clearance lift kits. You can mount them right out of the box, with their tough, OEM-style matte black finish - they're UV protected so they won't chalk. Or, paint them to match or accent the body color, for a factory-custom look.

Boss Pocket Style Fender Flares are made in the USA from our thick, warp-resistant Dura-Flex 2000 material, tailor-made for added durability and flexibility on the trail. When you need maximum tire coverage with minimum time and effort, it's in the pocket. Boss Pocket Style Fender Flares from Bushwacker.

node.display_name: KMC XD Series XD779 Badlands Chrome Wheels
node.long_desc: KMC XD Series XD779 Badlands Wheels;Wheel Size: 18, 20, 22 inch diameter;Bolt pattern: 5, 6, 8 Lug Design;Finish: Chrome;California Residents: WARNING"

Each set of Cut-Out Fender Flares is individually designed for your Jeep, Truck or SUV;Maximizes off road wheel travel and maintains adequate tire coverage;Constructed from thick, warp-proof Dura-Flex 2000 TPO material for insured flexibility and durability no matter what the street or trails conditions are;Bushwacker Cut Out Fender Flares are UV protected to guard against chalking and fading;The fender flares pro grade matte black finish provides a stunning and stylish addition to your vehicle or they can also be be to provide a custom look;Made in the USA with a Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
For extreme off-road use, there's nothing else like Bushwacker Cut-Out Fender Flares. Each set of Cut-Out Fender Flares is individually designed for your Jeep, Truck or SUV, to maximize off-road wheel travel and maintain adequate tire coverage. That custom approach means a smoother appearance, greater strength, and easier bolt-on installation with tough stainless steel hardware. As the name says, Cut-Out Fender Flares require cutting body sheet metal to achieve maximum articulation and coverage for oversized tires.

Cut-Out Fender Flares are made from thick, warp-proof Dura-Flex 2000 TPO, our own proprietary material, engineered for added durability and flexibility in severe conditions. Its UV protection guards against chalking, while its pro-grade matte black finish looks great as-is, or custom painted to create your own personal look.

Cut-Out Fender Flares offer extreme performance with style to match.

node.long_desc: Bushwacker Extend-A-Fender Fender Flares delivers premium grade protection and superior style;Adds additional on and off road clearance to fit larger tires and protects your vehicle from any flying road debris;Made from Dura-Flex 2000 material and are designed for added durability and flexibility no matter what the trail conditions are;Built in UV protection to resist chalking, cracking, and warping;OEM style matte black finish but can be paint for a completely personalized look;Installs in minutes with minimal drilling;Proudly made in the USA with a Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
You've equipped your vehicle with oversize wheels and tires for serious off-road traction and style. Now you need extra tire coverage to protect your rig's body and maybe even comply with local laws. Bushwacker Extend-A-Fender Flares deliver premium-grade protection and style matched to oversized tires. Yet, as tough as they are, they go on with minimal drilling required. You can install them in minutes and enjoy them for years - our exclusive Dura-Flex 2000 material is designed for added durability and flexibility, with built-in UV protection.

Your Extend-A-Fender Flares resist chalking, cracking, and warping, whether you leave them with their OEM-style matte black finish or paint them for a totally personalized look. Either way, your Jeep, Truck or SUV will look factory-equipped for your big off-road tires.

Extend-A-Fender Flares go on easy, perform tough, and look great.

node.long_desc: Serves as direct replacement for factory differential carrier;Ideal for repairs and an economical way to get the proper case;Quality materials and casting ensure perfect fit;Available for AMC, Chrysler, Dana, Dodge, Ford, GM and Toyota applications. ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Need to rebuild your factory differential but don't want to fork over a whole lot of dough? Look no further than G2 Axle & Gear's quality differential carriers which act as a direct replacement for your worn-out or damaged factory differential. What's more is that you won't risk getting the wrong carrier since G2 manufacturers a wide assortment of specific carriers for your vehicle.

G2 Axle & Gear's carriers are manufactured with painstaking detail and quality craftsmanship that's second to none. It's no surprise that shade-tree mechanics and enthusiasts around the world rely on G2 Axle & Gear's products.

Be sure to see the complete G2 Axle & Gear product lineup here.
"

node.long_desc: CNC-machined from 4130 billet steel for durability and light weight;Heat-treated to improve strength;Connects both axle shafts together;Offers the ultimate traction;Intended for performance applications;Not intended for street use;Wide application range including Ford, GM, Dana and Toyota;Exceptional 10-year warranty which covers parts against manufacturing defects;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
If you're looking for no-compromise performance and traction for your off-road vehicle, G2 Axle and Gear's full spools are just the ticket. The 85 Series' spools feature CNC-machined 4130 billet steel to provide rock-solid strength and light weight.

But G2 Axle and Gear take even more measures to ensure that their spools can handle anything. After machining, the spools are heat-treated to boost durability. And unlike limited-slip differentials, these spools mechanically link both driveshafts which in turn provides full-time power and torque to both drive wheels--even if one is in the air. This gives you the ultimate confidence in the toughest off-road situations.

node.long_desc: Key parts jeep rocker panel replacment panels to make rust repair a breeze; These panels are designed to replicate exact OEM fitment and offer increased coverage areas vs. the competitors;High gauge steel with OEM fitment and an Electro-Deposit primer (EDP) finish;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Key Parts offers complete vehicle coverage for rust and collision panels. These panels are designed to replicate exact OEM fitment and offer increased coverage areas vs. the competitors. Painted parts are shipped in advanced black EDP coating, where chrome parts are triple nickel chromed to the highest quality. Think Key Parts for your fender, floor pan, rust repair, and all body panel needs!

node.display_name: G2 Axle & Gear Dana 44 Axle Assemblies
node.long_desc: Complete drop-in high-performance axle kit;Comes complete with properly matched components;Stronger than factory Rubicon Axles;Premium 4340 chromoly material utilized for the ultimate strength;Bolt-in installation allows for clean installation;Genuine Dana Spicer U-Joints used;High-quality Timkin bearings for smooth, trouble-free operation;National seals used throughout;Ultra-reliable package that exceeds stock axle performance, durability and reliability ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Looking for the ultimate in strength and reliability? Upgrade to G2 Axle & Gear's Dana 44 axle assembly. High-quality premium components are used throughout, ensuring both performance and reliability in one complete package. All components are sourced and matched according to G2's stringent quality specifications and bolt right up and in to your Jeep.

Premium 4340 chromoly is utilized throughout, including the axles themselves (which serve as the foundation). The combination yields a bulletproof axle assembly that won't leave you stranded, mile-after-mile.

Genuine Dana Spicer U-Joints are also used, ensuring long life and trouble-free performance. Instead of using cheaper, lower-quality bearings, G2 has taken the high road by offering up high-quality Timkin bearings and long-lasting National seals to ensure that all the lubricants stay in while keeping all the dust, dirt and grim out.

node.sales_desc: T-Rex is a billet grille manufacturer dedicated to delivering a quality product. T-Rex specializes on a specific market and caters to the needs of the customer. Focused in the design department is in the fit and ease of installation which mean bolt-on billet grilles with less tools and no cutting which in turn equals more productivity. When it comes to manufacturing a quality product, it starts in the design department but it doesn't end there. T-Rex starts with solid stock of aircraft quality T-5 or T-6 billet aluminum rather than extruded aluminum as used by some competitors. Every billet grille is treated to a durable glossy powder-coat. The final stage of manufacturing includes a three-stage polishing and cleaning. The entire process takes place in their Southern California manufacturing facility.

node.sales_desc: TeraFlex HD ball joints are engineered to handle the increased load caused by oversized tires and offset wheels. The upper ball joint incorporates hard sintered wear bushings to handle extreme side load demands with out failure. The lower ball joint features a threaded top cap for adjustable preload and allows grease servicing without axle shaft removal, even with larger RCV shafts. A machined grease passage in the lower joint housing assembly provides lubrication access without affecting the ball joint load surface. Ball Joint features: 1045 carbon steel housing with magnesium phosphate coated assembly. 4140 chromoly ball/stud with magnesium phosphate anti-corrosion coating.

node.long_desc: Compact stand;Work with the standard Safe Jack Extensions;Wide bases provide great floatation and stability;Instructions included
node.sales_desc:
Warning! To avoid injury or death, support the load with a suitable support.

When you're Out There where are you going to find a suitable support? Jack stands are typically bulky and they don't have a wide range of operation. Safe Jack jack stands are compact and very adaptable to your situation. The wide bases provide great floatation and stability and the interchangeable and stackable extensions let you extend to any practical height.

Safe Jack, Jack Stands work with the standard Safe Jack Extensions."

node.long_desc: Jack pads and extensions made in the USA;Quality OMEGA brand bottle jack, packaged in a watertight, cans;Durable steel construction;Extension Screw Collar provides max useful stroke;Extensions and jack pads can be combined in any combination;Lift at an axle, frame or other lift point;Increases safety;Makes jacking easy in a variety of ways;More stable, secure
node.sales_desc: Safe Jack Off Road kits are the holy smokes do everything kit from SAFE JACK for the person that is serious about capability and safety. Includes MADE IN THE USA Jack Pads and Extensions. Safe Jack has paired them with a quality OMEGA brand bottle jack, packaged in a watertight Can.

node.long_desc: Flat base bent up to engage vehicle;Distributes force to the right spot so that the lifting force is applied to the structure that was designed to carry it;Sold individually
node.sales_desc: Many vehicles have specific jack points that must be used to prevent damage to the vehicle. The jack points often require a special jack pad to distribute force to the right spot so that the lifting force is applied to the structure that was designed to carry it. Failure to use the proper pad may cause expensive damage. Safe Jack jack pads for the RENNSTAND are available for many models . Select the one that is designed to work with your vehicle. Follow the manufacturer's instructions regarding jacking and supporting your vehicle.

node.display_name: Safe Jack Compact Wheel Chocks and Wheel Chains
node.long_desc: Steel construction;Chocks can be linked together by chain to keep them from skidding or sliding;Wheel chocks;Wheel chains;Instructions included
node.sales_desc: Compact, Nesting Wheel chocks take up very little space and can be stowed in the bottle jack or jack stand tool bags. The unique design allows the chocks to be linked together by chain to keep them from skidding or sliding. Steel construction.

node.long_desc: Designed to universally attach to any bottle jack using the washer and tab assemblies;Helps provide ultimate stability when jacking on uneven ground
node.sales_desc: The Universal Bases are designed to universally attach to any bottle jack using the washer and tab assemblies. This plate locks into Safe Jacks Universal Bottle Jack Stabilizer to provide ultimate stability when jacking on uneven ground.

node.long_desc: Powder coated finish;Strong steel construction;No snag points;Customizable -Works with Bottle jacks, Hi-Lift Type farm jacks and automotive scissor jacks;Can be used as an auxiliary base for automobile jacks;Easy to use;Easy to place using handles at each end;Low profile - easy to stow;Reduces ground loading;Provides a stable base for various types of jacks;Supports jacks on soft soil, mud, road shoulders;Switch from one type of jack to another in seconds
node.sales_desc: Think of the UNIVERSAL BASE PLATE and the other components of these system as LEGO blocks. Starting with the Base Plate as the foundation, other items can be added to create a stable and safe platform to operate a variety of bottle jacks or the Hi-Lift type farm jack. Interchangeable INSERT PLATES make switching from one type or size of jack to another a simple operation that just takes a couple of seconds. Take it along in the RV, 4X4, SUV, Service truck or on the farm.

node.long_desc: Durable powder coat finish;Secure lifter with bale pin;Can be used with up to 3/8 inch chain or High Strength Lift Straps;Securely attaches chains or lift straps or chokers;Lift loads that are too low for a Farm Jack;Lift loads that are forward of the jack base;Compact easy to stow;Installs in seconds;Quick release pins for fast installation
node.sales_desc:
Use the lifter to lift loads that would be forward of the jack base and to lift loads that are situated where it is not possible to place the jack under the load. Use it to pick up tractor tires, lift vehicles out of ruts or off obstacles. Use to lift machinery, shipping containers, boat trailers etc. Use to pull posts, shrubs and brush.

The (patent pending) Safe Jack Secure Lifter for Hi-Lift and farm style jacks is a very useful accessory for 4X4 enthusiasts, farm and ranch work, military applications and industrial plant operations. It provides for safe and secure attachment of a load to a Hi-Lift or farm jack style of jack and provides a stabilizer that holds the jack essentially parallel to the load being lifted. This makes the jack far safer to use and more useful that a jack without it. Use the Safe Jack Stabilizer with the Secure Lifter to maximize safety, stability and productivity. Hi-Lift Jack not included.

node.long_desc: Powder coat finish;All steel construction;Load rating per stand;Place the jack and jack stand at the correct lift point;Prevents damage to the vehicle;Compact enough to carry in your vehicle;Includes an 18M-P04 universal pinchweld pad
node.sales_desc:
Rennen means RACE in German. The patented Rennstand is revolutionary because it solves the problem of jacking and supporting in the right spot. It allows jacking and supporting using interchangeable jack pads designed for the vehicle. It's easy, sets up in seconds and it is safer for the vehicle and the operator. It can be used with most floor/ trolley jacks.

Safe Jack products make common jacks uncommonly safe. Always use caution when jacking a vehicle. Use wheel chocks Follow vehicle manufacturers jacking instructions. Safe Jack cannot cover all possible conditions and situations that may occur. The operator must understand that common sense and caution are factors, which cannot be built into this product, but must be supplied by the operator.

node.display_name: Safe Jack Talon Oil Filter Tool
node.long_desc: Three pin (TALON) engagement in oil filter plate for stability and strength;Good for up to 1500 in. lbs. of torque;Works in tight spaces;Works on Aircraft, Automotive, Marine and Recreational Vehicle applications;This is a lot less frustrating than trying to remove a stuck filter by any other method;Adjustable down to 1.10 in three prong mode for smaller oil filters;Adjustable down to .95" in two prong mode for smaller oil filters;Adjustable up to 3.14" for larger oil filtes"
node.sales_desc:
The TALON OIL FILTER TOOL has been reinvented and improved!! The 10M-TALON oil filter tool has undergone some changes through the years, improving as the demands of the customers became greater. The new TALON is the strongest and most compact yet. Just pop the NEW TALON on a 3/8 drive extension and ratchet and it gets the job done.

The TALON Oil Filter Tool was created to remove stubbornly stuck oil filters. Bogert Aviation wanted the tool to be safe in tight quarters and unable to slip, attempting to minimize damage to nearby components. This is still a messy process but this tool is your best chance of removing stuck filters without damaging anything else.
Comes with #10(0.194) and 6MM(0.236) screws

node.long_desc: Easy installation;Made to factory specifications;4-Layer construction w/ foam padding and protective polyester shell;Neoprene layer offers great breathability and water resistant;Includes full covers for seats - plus headrest covers where applicable
node.sales_desc:
Protect your seats from water, mud, and anything you can throw at it with Rough Country's front and rear Neoprene Seat Covers. These easy-to install covers fit snugly over your vehicle's seats to protect your interior from the elements while blending in perfectly.

These comfortable seat covers feature a 4-layer construction with a thick foam padding for a comfortable feel and durable quality. The outer Neoprene protective layer wards off water and mildew while being soft to the touch and offering great breathability. Each cover is designed to be an exact fit on your vehicle, with accessibility for airbags, seat adjustment, and more!

Each kit features a full front and/or rear set, with front seat covers, rear bench covers, and full headrest covers (on applicable models) to outfit your entire seating space. No tools required for this fast and simple upgrade, just slip each cover firmly over the seat and fasten with the built-in straps and you're ready to roll!
