node.sales_desc: These D-SS Light Covers from Rigid Industries are the perfect solution for style and function. With multiple color options, you can give your vehicle a unique look while also protecting your investment. These light covers are made from a durable polycarbonate plastic that offers an extra layer of protection for the lens of your D-SS light. Add the Amber light cover to your lights for improved visibility in snow or fog. These covers snap on and off, so swapping them out is simple and easy. They are also perfect for states that require covers on accessory lights.

node.display_name: Rubicon Express Spring Over Conversion Kits
node.long_desc: Spring Over Conversion Kits Includes:;Heavy-Duty Spring Perches Front and Rear;Heavy-Duty Spring Plates Front and Rear;Stainless Steel Brake Lines;Pitman Arm;Rubicon Express Advantage Lifetime Warranty;Extreme-Duty Spring Under Kits Include:;2.5 Inch Wide Extreme-Duty Front and Rear Leaf Springs;Greaseable Shackles;Greaseable Main Eye Bushings;Stainless Steel Brake Lines;Heavy-Duty U-Bolt Skid Plates;Durability, Flexibility and Ride Quality;New Extreme Durty Sway Bar Disconnects;Rubicon Express Advantage Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Rubicon Express spring-over axle conversion suspension system is designed for the truly adventurous off-roader and is a fabricators delight. This suspension system moves the leaf spring perches to the topside of the axle. The result is a net lift height increase of 5.5 inches with stock height springs. The use of stock spec springs will maintain the factory ride quality while the spring-over configuration will greatly increase the suspension flexibility, allow room for larger tires and vastly improve the visual appeal of your Jeep. The spring-over conversion requires welding new perches to the top of the axle. Steering modifications are required and a CV-driveshaft is mandatory. If you desire even more lift, the addition of a set of Rubicon Express Extreme-Duty leaf springs (RE1444 and RE1445) result in a total lift height of 7 inches. The spring-over axle suspension configuration will allow the use of 33 inch tires when using stock leaf springs. The fitment of even larger tires is possible with additional modifications.Steering modifications will be needed

node.long_desc: Roof pad: Prevents car top carrier bags from shifting in transit;Cable lock:Provides security for roof top carrier bags;Designed for ease of use and functionality;Keeping your gear safe and secure;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: There is nothing better than a road trip with family or friends, especially when you can take your extra gear with you. Rightline Gear continue to be innovative leaders, constantly improving their designs for ease of use and functionality.Offering tents, car top carriers , duffle bags , Jeep storage bags, roof pads, cable locks and much more. Fitting all size vehicles with or without luggage racks. Whether you are going on the family vacation, moving, going off to college, or just taking that weekend getaway, Rightline Gear have what you need to make your trip possible. Forget experiencing any type of stress while loading your Jeep and just concentrate on having fun. These weatherproof products are tough enough to handle the elements while giving you room for all of your gear.

node.long_desc: Designed to Weatherproof with welded seams and urethane coated zippers;PVC Coated Mesh re-enforced for strength and UV protected;Use for off-roading, road trips, and every day storage;Hard plastic insert in the top of the bag provides shape and structure;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The bags are angled to perfectly fit over the rear wheel wells and feature a main compartment, a zippered pocket, a mesh pocket, and a carry handle. A hard plastic insert in the top of the bags provides shape and structure.

node.long_desc: Dimensions: 36 L x 7-12" W x 23" H;Straps to the roll bars, rear seat headrests, and lower attachment rings;PVC Coated Mesh re-enforced for strength and UV protected;Includes: bag and set up guide;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The bag is angled to perfectly fit behind the Wrangler's rear seat and features (4) zippered compartments, (2) hard plastic shelves, an inner mesh pouch, and a carry handle. A hard plastic insert in the top of the bag provides shape and structure.

node.display_name: Rightline Gear Soft Top Window Storage Bags
node.long_desc: Straps to the roll bars, behind the rear seat headrests, or behind the front seat headrests, top up or top down;PVC Coated Mesh re-enforced for strength and UV protected;Includes: bag, neoprene window sleeve, and set up guide;Dimensions: 55 L x 6" D;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
There is just not a good place for your soft top windows when you remove them from your Jeep. Place them in your garage or behind your rear seats and you will probably find them scratched up as a result. Place them in one of the traditional rectangular storage bags and they take up too much space. The weatherproof Soft Top Window Storage Bag solves these problems by holding your soft top windows, scratch-free, rolled up and strapped to one of several locations on your Jeep.

Your (3) windows are held inside individual pockets of the neoprene window sleeve. Neoprene is the spongy material commonly used to make wetsuits and its nonabrasive, highly protective, and water resistant qualities make it perfect for this application. The material does not pick up dirt, lint or other debris from the ground, so it is easy to keep clean. The neoprene sleeve is rolled up, buckled tight, and slid into the Window Storage Bag.

The Storage Bag attaches to your Jeep's roll bars, behind the rear seat headrests, or behind the front seat headrests. Quick release buckles make attaching and removing the bag a breeze. The rear window bar provides structure for the bag, keeping it from sagging or flapping in the wind. Our goal is for you to easily enjoy your Jeep with its windows out.

node.long_desc: Controls all brake settings with a simple push-button rotary knob;Clean, dash-mounted, OEM-style user interface with 10 tri-color LEDs;Main module can be mounted out of sight;Triple-axis, motion-sensing accelerometer for highly responsive, smooth stops;Easily accessible manual override with the press of a button;User-selectable power output and trailer brake light activation;Automatic leveling and calibration eliminate setup requirements;Equipped with a quick plug for easy, plug-and-play installation;Built-in reverse-polarity and short-circuit protection;Compatible with low-voltage systems, PWM systems, ABS and cruise control;Tow vehicle 'low voltage' and trailer disconnect indicators;Features two installation options: drill mount or surface adhesive mount;Includes mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Curt Spectrum trailer brake controller gives you powerful, precise braking operation in an extremely simple and subtle design inside your vehicle. It features an LED-equipped, rotary knob interface and a separate main module with an advanced accelerometer. This allows for an OE look and feel to be maintained inside the cab of your vehicle. The separated design of the Spectrum brake control allows the main module to be mounted behind the dash of the vehicle, completely out of sight. Meanwhile, the compact, unobtrusive interface can be fully integrated into the dash with just a single hole.

node.display_name: Curt Manufacturing Echo Mobile Brake Controllers
node.long_desc: Wireless, portable design allows for easy transfer from one vehicle to another;Bluetooth connection to control all brake settings from your smartphone;Custom-designed app monitors brake activity and sends status updates;Non-invasive, plug-and-play install;Triple-axis, motion-sensing accelerometer for highly responsive, smooth stops;Compatible with low-voltage systems, PWM systems, ABS and cruise control;Potted enclosure seals off electronics from the elements for lasting durability;Automatic calibration reduces setup requirements;Stores multiple user and vehicle-trailer profiles;Downloadable app available for Apple iOS and Android OS;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Echo brake control is truly a brake control for the modern age. It plugs into your vehicle and wirelessly connects to your smartphone, allowing you to control and monitor all trailer brake activity right from your own device. It comes with a customizable app for Apple or Android phones, a portable design to easily switch between vehicle-trailer combinations and a durable, weather-resistant construction.

node.long_desc: Durability with chrome-plated finish;Fits ATVs, UTVs or lawn tractors with 5/8 ball hole;2000 lbs GTW;Constructed from high-strength, hot-forged steel;Mounting platform must be at least 3/8" thick;Hole size must not be more than 1/16" larger in diameter than the threaded shank;Limited lifetime warranty (one-year finish, one-year parts);California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Whether you are towing gear out into the field or just getting some yardwork done, Curt ATV tow balls and lawn tractor hitch balls are the perfect addition to your four wheeler, side-by-side or lawnmower. They feature industry-standard dimensions, a tested towing capacity and a durable construction to withstand the outdoor elements.

The Out & Back AT is designed to perform in all conditions, getting you out and back reliably and comfortably. The tread designs features a center V" tread pattern to deliver comfort and control on hardpack. At the same time, the 3/4" deep, dimpled lugs dig aggressively and cleanout well to keep you moving through deep and sticky mud. Wraparound shoulder lugs provide side bite.

Its 6-ply bias carcass and robust rim guard provides exceptional reliability while remaining surprisingly light. The result is a tire that lives up to its name. If you're going way out and want to get back, get outfitted with a set of STI Out & Back tires. For more aggressive options, check out the large family of Out & Back tires, including the XT, XLT and Out & Back Max tires."

With its 8-ply-rated radial carcass, the Roctane XD is built to confidently handle today's UTVs and ATVs, no matter how large, fast and aggressive they are. And with a dozen different sizes, including the new super-tall 34-inch, plus 30- and 32-inch models, there is a Roctane XD for your machine.

STI Roctane XD tires use a heavier denier nylon cord to maximize tire toughness while retaining flexibility for a comfortable ride. The Roctane's unique, non-directional tread design and wide profile footprint deliver smooth, quiet operation and precise control. STI's exclusive RocWall sidewall construction features reinforced lower sidewalls and extra-wide tread belts for added shoulder protection and stability. Add in super-deep RocGuard rim guards to protect even the thickest wheel lips from trail damage, and the result is the most reliable tire on the market.

STI Roctane XD deliver ideal grip on the slickest rocks, and with their tread size and design gives these tires exceptional traction in muddy conditions. Even with the all-conditions performance of these Roctane XDs, they're still reasonably priced.
Did you lose a center cap? Here is a replacement center cap for your STI Wheels.

The legendary mud performance of the Out & Back Max tire is now available to mount on 20 UTV wheels. The new lightweight, 9" wide Out & Back Max'D tires are here to serve your mud lifestyle with all-around high-performance traction and aggressive style.

The new Out & Back Max'D features stepped, 1.5" - 2.0" deep all-terrain tread that tracks through mud and cleans well, plus a durable and lightweight 8 ply-rated carcass, and a deep rim guard that will protect your stylish wheel investment. Three sizes are available 33", 35" and 36" all to wrap around 20" wheels like the STI HD10, and the new 20" HD4.

The STI Out & Back tire family includes a range of sizes for ATVs and UTVs, and they've proven to be all-around performers, with the Max tires excelling in deep mud."

The all-new STI HD10 wheels bring a fresh level of style and a higher level of size to the HD Alloy family with 20 applications, plus 15", 14" and 12" sizes. These new wheels are built with the same strength and durability as all HD Alloy wheels, and come with the STI lifetime warranty.

With their classic 8 spoke style and clean look, the HD10 wheels feature chrome bolt accents on top of four finish styles - gloss black, gloss black with machined, matte black with smoke, and the striking chrome finish that is ultra durable with triple plating.

A small and low-profile center cap bolts on securely. The wheels are designed to work with most stock Polaris lug nuts for convenience."

node.display_name: Pro Series Replacement Head Mounting Hardware Kits
node.long_desc: Pro Series Replacement Head Mounting Hardware;20K;California Residents: WARNING"
Friction Sway Control;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc:
The new STI Sand Drifter tire combo gives UTV drivers powerful control of their machines in the dunes, from the expanse of Glamis to the cool shores of Lake Michigan. The tri-rib front is light and precise, and the 14 paddle rear puts the power to the sand efficiently.

New 32 Sand Drifters give UTV drivers a taller dune-shredder with the same wide footprint that helps high-powered machines float over the dunes."

The all-new STI HD10 wheels bring a fresh level of style and a higher level of size to the HD Alloy family with 20 applications, plus 15", 14" and 12" sizes. These new wheels are built with the same strength and durability as all HD Alloy wheels, and come with the STI lifetime warranty.

With their classic 8 spoke style and clean look, the HD10 wheels feature chrome bolt accents on top of four finish styles - gloss black, gloss black with machined, matte black with smoke, and the striking chrome finish that is ultra durable with triple plating.

A small and low-profile center cap bolts on securely. The wheels are designed to work with most stock Polaris lug nuts for convenience."

Built to chew up and spit out rocks, roots and mud, the all new STI Roctane X2 will conquer trails with long lasting performance. The Roctane X2 uses its large footprint and multi-edge tread to deliver sure-footed traction.

Designed using a two stage radial carcass, this 10 ply rated tire features dual-steel belts, stepped shoulder tread, and a deep rim guard. The leading edge design produces a tire that's more uniform and delivers superior handling and comfort in choppy and loose terrain. Whether you ride in the woody hills out east or the rocky trails out west or anywhere in between, the STI Roctane X2 supplies the durability and the performance you need.

The all-new STI Roctane X2 tires are available now in sizes from 27 up to 32" for 14" wheels."

A bigger, bolder and more extreme mud tire, the STI R4 is specifically designed and engineered for high-performance UTV and ATV applications. The 8 ply rated, tubeless radial carcass tire measures nine inches wide. The R4 features super deep lugs 1.75 at center and 2.0" at the shoulder - angled to optimize traction performance both forward and in reverse.

This mud tire is constructed for durability too, with a rubber compound built for abuse. The R4's deep rim guard protects your wheels as well. Other tires may look the same, but only the STI R4 enters the mud with lugs this deep and a carcass this strong - and at a comparatively low weight."

STI revolutionizes the Roctane with the new XR family of tires, led by a 35 trail-tamer tire made for 18" wheels (like the all-new STI HD9 18"). The XR line also includes four more sizes, from 28" to 33" tires. With their 9.5" wide sizing and new 8 ply rated carcass, the Roctane XRs deliver lightweight, all-terrain performance at a great price.

With the changes they engineered, STI was able to deliver tires that are 20 to 30 percent lighter than similar-sized Roctane XD tires, and are available at retail prices up to 30 percent lower. And performance was not sacrificed.

Starting with the original Roctane XD, STI re-imagined a lighter, all-terrain, trail-oriented tire to make the new Roctane XR. With superior traction and precise handling, the Roctane XR tires set a higher standard for all-terrain traction, with handling that's on the money - for less money."

node.display_name: Genuine Packages Tire Air Down Kit
node.long_desc: For the added convenience of being able to air-up or air-down your tires to accommodate various types of terrain;Smittybilt Air Compressor is the most powerful compression unit in its class with a 1/3 horsepower oil-less direct drive motor and a 30 amp inline fuse;Durable and accurate incorporating a anodized aluminum barrel with an automatic bleeder valve;Reads 0-60 P.S.I.;California Residents: WARNING"

Whether on or off-road, you?re the boss of these mud flaps;Made from our durable AntiSpray material with 14 gauge laser-cut Stainless Steel anchor weights, our easy to install Mud Flaps allow you the option of adjusting their angle or even removing them all-together for extreme off-roading;California Residents: WARNING"

2 and 4-door models;Optically clear tinted acrylic lens reduces eye strain;Cuts down on general glare;Allows unobstructed visibility;Multi position adjustment;Adjustable friction knobs;Vanity mirror;Secondary tinted lens;Accessory mounts available;Some drilling and riveting required;Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TeraFlex Axis sun visor system provides complete field of vision while reducing glare and reflections when driving. The factory sun visor blocks the field of vision while driving, diminishing both safety and the outdoor view. This system maximizes safety and visibility by eliminating those obstructions, while restoring the full outdoor view to both the driver and passenger. The impact resistant deep tinted lens protects from UV rays and eye-strain for a premium travel experience while still providing a sharp, clean view. TeraFlex went a step farther with a multi-position lens, allowing customized adjustment for driving conditions.

node.long_desc: Automatic and manual transmissions;Mopar parts and accessories are expedited directly from authorized Mopar dealers strategically located all across the U.S.;OEM Mopar parts are the best for restoring your vehicle to factory condition performance;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Body Armor 4x4 Pro-Series Front Bumper Wings
node.long_desc: 2 and 4-door models;3/16 inch steel plate construction;Round pockets for OEM or 3 inch round lights;Sold as a pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Add extra protection or widen the profile of your Pro-Series Stubby Winch Bumper with these bolt on wings. They are constructed of 3/16 steel plate with a textured powder coated finish. They also allow the use of OEM or aftermarket 3" round lights. Sold as a pair."

AnzoUSA offers the best quality performance lighting products at an affordable cost. All AnzoUSA products are SAE and D.O.T. compliant to FMVSS No. 108 and manufactured in our state-of-the-art ISO 9002 and QS 9000 quality certified factory. Our lighting products are designed using CAD/CAM computerized equipment and these modern designs are then tested using 3-dimensional testing machine to insure precision and accuracy in the research, development and design of our molds.

node.long_desc: Drag Link;1.25 inch D.O.M.;Fully Adjustable;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Fits The Factory Tie Rod End,Allows For Maximum Articulation,Strongest Tie Rod Tube Available,Limited Lifetime Warranty

node.display_name: Vision X VL-Series LED Work Lights
node.long_desc: Available in different sizes;With or without a connector
node.sales_desc: he VL-Series LED Light Duty offers outstanding light output in a functional design which can be easily adjusted with the single bolt bracket. High quality construction and components enable VL-Series LED Light Duty to withstand vibration up to 15.6 Grms. Built-in reverse polarity protection helps prevent accidental damage caused by incorrect installation. VL-Series LED Light Duty work lighting is a high value, versatile range designed for many light duty commercial applications.

node.display_name: Weigh Safe Fixed Height Ball Mounts
node.long_desc: Tongue weight scale built into the ball mount platform helps you balance your trailer;Promotes safe towing lets you know if your load needs to be adjusted before you tow;Simple operation automatically provides a measurement every time you couple your trailer;Efficient and hassle-free eliminates the need for separate or commercial scales;6061 T6 billet aluminum shank and mounting platform provide superior strength and durability;Solid block construction provides greater strength than hollow steel competitors while also maintaining a light weight;Rustproof for a clean finish that stands the test of time;Meets SAE J684 and V5 certification standards
node.sales_desc: The Weigh Safe fixed height ball mount measures tongue weight, similar to the award winning Weigh Safe adjustable ball mount. The Weigh Safe fixed height ball mount is designed to function with all standard 2 receivers (as well as the 2.5" and 3" hitch receivers with sleeve inserts/receiver reducers installed) . The fixed height ball mount boasts an industry leading maximum gross trailer weight (GTW) of 10,000 pounds along with a maximum tongue weight of 1,500 pounds, and is constructed with solid bar aircraft grade aluminum alloy. Please note: The gauge will only work in the drop position but can be used to tow in both the rise and drop position."

node.long_desc: Available in black or red powder coat finish;Designed to work with most aftermarket bumpers;Made from steel;Includes stainless steel mounting hardware;For use with Hawse fairleads and synthetic rope;Will not work on Bumpers with Recessed Fairlead" mounting locations"
node.sales_desc: The Fishbone Offroad Fishhook is the perfect solution to take control of your winch cable and hook, on the front of your Jeep. The Fishhook is designed to work with most aftermarket bumpers and using the two holes for your fairlead to mount onto the bumper. Please Note: If you have a Recessed Fairlead mounting surface that's not flush and flat, you may run into issues mounting the Fishhook. The overall width of the Fishhook is 16 end to end. During testing we found that recessed furled mounting applications run into issues with the Fishhook fitting inside the recessed area."

node.long_desc: Powdered metal gusher bearing design enables grease to flow through bearing;Engineered steel composition results in a stronger component;Full ball metal stud provides 360 degrees of smooth, consistent, rotational movement resulting in more responsive steering;Loose or worn chassis parts can lead to premature tire wear;Greaseable socket reduces corrosion and wear by allowing new lubricant to flush contaminants
node.sales_desc: MOOG Problem Solver products incorporate proven design and engineering features for like new steering, ease of installation and longer life. MOOG is the preferred steering and suspension brand of professional technicians and NASCAR crew chiefs.

node.sales_desc: MOOG Problem Solver products incorporate proven design and engineering features for like new steering, ease of installation and longer life. MOOG is the preferred steering and suspension brand of professional technicians and NASCAR crew chiefs.

node.display_name: DV8 Offroad Flip Up License Plate Relocation Bracket
node.long_desc: Universal design; Excellent durability;Flips out of the way;Flip and Winch" design;Mounts to any fairlead (roller or hawse);Relocating bracket only - roller or hawse not included"
node.sales_desc: DV8 Offroad functional 50 state legal license plate mount that allows anyone to flip and winch". Just pull the plate up and you are ready for recovery. Mounts to any fairlead (roller or hawse) and keeps your rig street legal."

node.display_name: DV8 Offroad Adaptive Cruise Control Relocating Bracket
node.long_desc: Textured black powder coat finish;Economical relocation bracket;Keeps use of OEM Adaptive Cruise Control;Can be used with any bumper
node.sales_desc:
Adaptive Cruise Relocation Bracket can be used with any aftermarket bumper. It moves the Adaptive cruise sensor up into the grill so that it is still operational and the adjustable design allows you to tune it in just right for your vehicle.
** DV8 assumes no responsibility for improperly installed brackets **

node.display_name: DV8 Offroad OEM Style Hard Top Mounting Brackets
node.long_desc: Allows owners to mount a hardtop;Meant for Jeeps that came with a soft top;Less expensive than OEM alternatives;Includes all hardware and brackets necessary
node.sales_desc: The DV8 Offroad Mouting Bracket Set is used to mount a hardtop on a Wrangler that came from the factory with the soft top package. Most won't even know that they need this until they purchase an aftermarket or second hand hard top and try to install it on their Jeep! To solve this issue DV8 has developed an inexpensive solution in similar form to the OEM brackets which cost hundreds if purchased directly from Jeep.
Belltech C-Sections use a bolt-in" wrap around frame design to recover lost overall suspension travel and frame strength on aggressively lowered vehicles."

node.long_desc: ReadyLIFT-Bilstein 8125 Performance Coil-Over Upgrade;Exclusive design featuring Eibach ERO coil springs and customized shock valving;Includes ReadyLIFT brackets for mounting reservoir canister
node.sales_desc: Some of the exciting features of this new program are based off Bilstein's 2.625 monotube design reservoir coil-overs designed for the most extreme terrain. Each shock features custom valving from over a year of testing by ReadyLIFT and Bilstein engineers. Lower rod ends feature 3/4" bearings and proprietary high misalignment spacers while ReadyLIFT-specific 90-degree reservoir fittings ensure ideal canister placement and hose fitment. ReadyLIFT and Bilstein included Eibach in this project, tasking the spring giant with developing a specific ERO coil spring just for this application. These springs are unique in the marketplace, featuring a silver powder coat finish with the ReadyLIFT brand name included on the spring."

node.display_name: Reese High-Performance Spring Bar And Trunnion
node.long_desc: High-Performance Spring Bar And Trunnion;Replacement;800 lbs.;California Residents: WARNING"
For use with the front lower control arms ONLY;Allows proper alignment
node.sales_desc: Get the most out of your alignment with this Jeep cam-bolt kit. This kit allows proper alignment on your Jeep. Rough Country's Cam Bolt Kit helps lifted Jeeps achieve optimal alignment settings by adding negative camber in the front, thus offsetting the additional height.

node.long_desc: Single or dual stabilizers available;Easy bolt-on installation;Improves control and handling;Reduces bump steer;Reduces tie rod and ball joint wear and tear;Chrome hardened 18mm piston rod
node.sales_desc: Steering stabilizers are designed to restrain bump steering" and front end vibration, giving added life to tires, ball joints, and other steering components and are highly recommended for vehicles running aftermarket tires. The durable 18mm chrome hardened piston rod and large-bodied cylinder dwarfs factory equipment, ensuring a more effective vibration damping each and every time you take to the trails. Rough Country's N3 Steering Stabilizer kit is easy to install, with a 100% bolt-on installation process that can be installed in a home garage with common tools."

node.display_name: American Truxx AT183 Spyder Black / Milled Wheels
node.sales_desc:
From the design and engineering stage, all the way to the expertly applied finishes, American Truxx wheels outshines the competition. Besides the standard chrome, polished, gloss and satin black finishes, American Truxx offers a creative brushed finish for their cast wheels that emulates the brushed metal look of raw forged wheels, giving customers who like the forged look a cost-effective option. And for those who want to step up to true forged wheels, American Truxx has them covered as well. All the benefits of added structural strength, durability, along with lighter weight, make forged the clear choice for performance-minded customers.

There are many choices out there for truck wheels. American Truxx's attitude and style are not the only things that set them apart. Their quality, and service are the best in the business. They stand behind their products because they are engineered to meet their exhaustive standards. Integrity and character are what they do when no one is looking. American Truxx strives to uphold the highest personal and professional values possible because their name and reputation are paramount to establishing authentic, lasting success.

node.display_name: Rough Country Retract Electric Running Board Steps
node.long_desc: Corrosion-resistant finish;Durable aluminum construction;600lb weight capacity;Automatic, motorized swing-out extension motion;Automatically tucks away when door is closed;6-inch drop for easy entry;Sold as a pair;Easy Plug and Play" connection;No drilling required;3-year limited warranty"
node.sales_desc:
Rough Country's RETRACT Electric Running Board Steps offer you a sleek, modern way to climb into your cab. These durable electric side steps feature a motorized swing-out function that instantly extends the step when you unlock the cab or open the door. The convenient 6-inch drop profile allows for easy entry and works great on trucks from stock height to any size lift. Once the door closes, the step automatically tucks away for a clean look.

Rough Country's retractable truck steps feature an easy Plug and Play" assembly, connecting directly to your battery terminal and OBDII port for easy installation without the need for complicated wiring. With a durable aluminum construction and corrosion-resistant finish, these automated truck steps are designed for a long operational lifespan no matter where the road takes you."

node.long_desc: Rear U-bolt kit;9/16 x 10 x 2-1/2
node.sales_desc: A properly installed u-bolt eliminates any flexing of the leaf spring in the area between the u-bolts. This is particularly critical since the hole for the centerbolt in each leaf acts as a stress concentration which would lead to rapid leaf breakage if spring flexing was not totally eliminated by the U bolt clamping force.

node.long_desc: Control lights, fridges, compressor, inverter, water pumps and more;Monitor water and temperature levels;Get live data on the battery system when paired with the Manager30;Bluetooth connectivity to RedVision app from mobile device;Modern, user-friendly interface;Combines power protection, distribution and control
node.sales_desc: The RedVision Total Vehicle Management System gives you an unprecedented level of control and automation when you're travelling by bringing information and control right to your fingertips. RedVision comes equipped with an in-vehicle mounted display and a user-friendly mobile app that enables the control and monitoring of many functions in a camper, trailer or overlanding vehicle.

node.long_desc: Textured black finish;Constructed of galvanized steel tube frame;Optional bolt-on polymer skid plate;Unique combination of: skid plate, rock and splash guard, non-slip patented access step and recessed light mount;Light mount option;Will not interfere with OEM bumper mounted front facing sensors;Replaceable polymer rub plate for an additional layer of protection from road debris;Complete kit with brackets and RC3 LR skid plate;No drilling required;5-year limited warranty on finish
node.sales_desc: Go Rhino LR Skid Plate with option of LED light mount and Center step in a black textured powdercoat finish. Features tubular construction and contoured Polymer Rub plates. Recessed Light mount option. 5 Year Limited warranty on finish.

node.display_name: American Truxx AT1900 Sweep Chrome Wheels
node.long_desc: Sizes: 20;Bolt Patterns: 5, 6, and 8 lug;Finish: Chrome;Max Load: 2500-3500 lbs"
node.sales_desc:
From the design and engineering stage, all the way to the expertly applied finishes, American Truxx wheels outshines the competition. Besides the standard chrome, polished, gloss and satin black finishes, American Truxx offers a creative brushed finish for their cast wheels that emulates the brushed metal look of raw forged wheels, giving customers who like the forged look a cost-effective option. And for those who want to step up to true forged wheels, American Truxx has them covered as well. All the benefits of added structural strength, durability, along with lighter weight, make forged the clear choice for performance-minded customers.

There are many choices out there for truck wheels. American Truxx's attitude and style are not the only things that set them apart. Their quality, and service are the best in the business. They stand behind their products because they are engineered to meet their exhaustive standards. Integrity and character are what they do when no one is looking. American Truxx strives to uphold the highest personal and professional values possible because their name and reputation are paramount to establishing authentic, lasting success.

Skyjacker continues to strive to stay ahead of the game in the aftermarket industry. They were one of the very first ones to provide the market with a true suspension system for Jeeps and continue to do so for UTVs and Side by Sides.

node.display_name: Rigid Industries Radiance Plus SR-Series RGBW LED Light Bars
node.long_desc: Single Row LED Light Bar With 8 Backlight;Options: Red, Green, Blue, Light Blue, Purple, Amber, White Or Rotating;10 Year Warranty 9-15 V DC Harness And Switch Sold Separately;Back Lighting Independently Controlled Using Switch Logic;Black Powder Coat Finish;Pressure Equalizing Vent;IP68 Compliant - Dust/Water Ingress;High Grade Aluminum Alloy Housing And Heat Sink Over/Under Voltage Protection;High Impact Polycarbonate Lens;Mounting Brackets Included;RFI/EMI Protection;RoHS Compliant;Off road use only
node.sales_desc:
The versatility of the RIGID Radiance lighting family just got even better with the introduction of the Radiance Plus SR-Series. RIGID's RGB LEDs provide the user with the ability to toggle between eight available back light options with the flip of a switch: Red, Green, Blue, Light Blue, Purple, Amber, White or Rotating.

The RIGID Radiance Plus SR-Series single row LED light bar is the perfect solution for those who want RIGID's legendary quality at a level everyone can attain. Utilizing RIGID's LED technology, the Radiance Plus light bars feature the same superior build quality as the rest of RIGID's lighting products, providing reliable and efficient lighting on demand.

The Radiance Plus SR-Series LED light bars are built with the same sleek low-profile high-grade aluminum alloy housing as the legendary SR-Series, but that's where the visual similarities end.

Inside, the Radiance SR-Series is feature-packed, with a black exposed circuit board, optimized forward projecting Broad Spot optics, prominent RIGID branding plates, and RGB LEDs with seven back light colors.

Available in 10, 20, 30, 40 and 50 inch lengths, and fits all existing SR-Series mounting options. The RIGID Radiance Plus SR-Series light bar is for the customer who wants a truly custom look, making it easier than ever to Own The Night.

Professional Installation Recommended, RIGID Radiance, Single Row, Backlight Same Construction As RIGIDs SR-Series Fits All SR-Series Light Covers And Mounts Black Exposed Printed Circuit Board 8 Back Lighting Options: Red, Green, Blue, Light Blue, Purple, Amber, White Or Rotating.

node.long_desc: Multiple pre-drilled holes to mount lights;Compatible with most retractable, roll-up, and folding bed covers;Features a textured powder coat finish that's covered by a 5 year warranty
node.sales_desc: The Sport Bar 3.0 takes the classic sport bar look and adds compatibility with most bed covers.

node.long_desc: Textured black powder coat finish;Constructed of steel;0.120 wall steel tubing;1.750 in. diameter;Sold as a pair;Bolt-on application, no drilling required;Hardware included;Limited warranty
node.sales_desc: Rampage's new TrailCrawler steps will give you the confidence you need out on the trail as an extreme rock slider. They have the stylish off-road look and a solid one piece designed step. The steps feature a durable black powder-coated finish.

node.display_name: BAK Industries BAKFlip F1 Hard Folding Tonneau Cover with BAK Box 2
node.sales_desc: When you need to load furniture or other large items in your bed, simply fold the F1 toward your cab and fasten the support struts. You'll have total bed access and the ability to drive safely down the road without removing the cover. A water drainage system incorporated into the tonneau cover channels liquids off the F1 and into drainage tubes that exit through your bed, keeping your cargo safe and dry. The panels on the F1 are made of fiberglass reinforced polymer (FRP), a lightweight and heat-resistant material that is virtually dent proof. A textured-black powder coat covers the FRP panels. You can install the F1 with a wrench and socket. No drilling is necessary. To open the F1, just pull the string latches to fold the cover toward your cab. When you close the cover, the latches will automatically engage with the rail. Open the cover by pulling the string latch located on either side of your bed. The latches automatically re-engage with the rail when you close the cover.

node.display_name: FOX 4.4 Factory Race Series External Bypass Shocks
node.long_desc: Smooth bore and honed seamless steel body;Zinc plated for a long-lasting finish;Black anodized, CNC machined 6061-T6 billet aluminum;Stainless steel for improved performance at high temperatures;Tunable, velocity sensitive deburred valve shims;High-temp Viton redundant sealing pack system with main seal, wiper seal and scraper seal;JM92 Advanced Suspension Fluid for improved performance at variable temperatures;17-4 H900 hard chrome plated stainless steel;Spherical, PFTE-lined, heat-treated alloy steel bearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: At FOX, racing has always been the cornerstone of our product development. FOX devotes countless hours of research and development to design suspension that withstands incredible punishment and provides consistent performance you can rely on.Our diverse line of bypass shocks, from the 2.5 coil-over with internal bypass to the massive 4.4 inch external bypass, are made with one goal in mind: to win races.

node.long_desc: Smooth bore and honed seamless steel body;Zinc plated for a long-lasting finish;Black anodized, CNC machined 6061-T6 billet aluminum;Application specific adjustable 3.0 racing spring;Race developed high flow design;Tunable, velocity sensitive deburred valve shims;Redundant sealing pack system, main seal, wiper seal, scraper seal;JM92 Advanced Suspension Fluid for improved performance at variable temperatures;7/8" hard chrome plated, heat-treated alloy steel;Spherical, PFTE-lined, heat-treated alloy steel bearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Off-road Performance Series coil-over shocks take advantage of our tried and-true coil-over design and incorporates features like rubber braided steel hoses with high-flow fittings for improved durability and performance.Pinch-bolt spring preload rings allow easy ride height and preload adjustment and retain the top quality racing coil selected to deliver your optimal spring rate. Our off-road Performance Series coil-over shocks will suspend your vehicle's weight and provide our race-proven, performance damping technology to tame the toughest terrain. If you are looking for a comfortable ride and predictable off-road handling, look no further.

node.display_name: FOX 3.0 Factory Race Series Coilover Internal Bypass Reservoir Shocks
node.long_desc: 3.0 Smooth bore and honed seamless alloy body;Zinc-plated for long lasting finish;2.5" Smooth bore and honed seamless alloy reservoir;Black-anodized, CNC-machined 6061-T6 billet aluminum;Application specific, adjustable 3.625 Eibach racing springs;7/8" 17-4 H900 stainless steel hard-chrome plated;6061-T6 hard-anodized, high flow aluminum piston;Application specific valving to maximize performance;Redundant sealing pack system main seal, wiper seal, scraper seal Optional high temperature Viton seals;JM92 Advanced Suspension Fluid for improved performance at variable temperatures;PTFE-lined, heat-treated, alloy steel spherical bearing;Direct replacement of OEM shock package;Ride height preload ring;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: At FOX, racing has always been the cornerstone of our product development. Our 3.0 Factory Race Series Coil-over Internal Bypass, position-sensitive shocks maximize the entire wheel travel, increases oil capacity, and adds 60% more damping area over the stock FOX SVT shocks. They allow for a plush predictable ride over normal off-road driving conditions and also have the ability to ramp up damping force for extreme use.These heavy-duty, steel-bodied shocks are loaded with anodized billet aluminum components and race-bred internal valving. They are designed to bolt right on to your factory mounts. The integrated coil spring can be adjusted for preload and ride height and come pre-set to level your vehicle right out of the box. Large 2.5 inch remote reservoirs with a large -10 hose increasing the shocks cooling capabilities. The 3.0 Factory Race Series Coil-over Internal Bypass shocks utilizing all of the same components from our race winning Trophy Truck shocks with Eibach springs, stainless steel shock shafts, PTFE-lined spherical bearings, proprietary racing oil and high-temp Viton seals.

node.display_name: FOX 3.0 Factory Race Series External Bypass Reservoir Shocks
node.long_desc: 3.0 Smooth bore and honed seamless alloy body;Zinc-plated for long lasting finish;2.5" Smooth bore and honed seamless alloy reservoir;Black-anodized, CNC-machined 6061-T6 billet aluminum;7/8" 17-4 H900 stainless steel hard-chrome plated;6061-T6 hard-anodized, high flow aluminum piston;Application specific valving to maximize performance;Redundant sealing pack system main seal, wiper seal, scraper seal High temperature Viton seals;JM92 Advanced Suspension Fluid for improved performance at variable temperatures;JM92 Advanced Suspension Fluid for improved performance at variable temperatures;PTFE-lined, heat-treated, alloy steel spherical;Direct replacement of OEM shock package;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: At FOX, racing has always been the cornerstone of our product development. Our 3.0 Factory Race Series Bypass, position-sensitive shocks maximize the entire wheel travel, increases oil capacity, and adds 60% more damping area over the stock FOX SVT shocks. The 3.0 Factory Series Bypass shocks were developed with three independently owner tunable bypass zones for complete ride control regardless of terrain conditions. They allow for a plush predictable ride over normal off-road driving conditions and also have the ability to ramp up damping force for extreme use.These heavy-duty, steel-bodied shocks are loaded with anodized billet aluminum components and race-bred internal valving. They are designed to bolt right on to your factory mounts. Large 2.5 inch remote reservoirs increasing the shocks cooling capabilities. The 3.0 Factory Race Series Coil-over Internal Bypass shocks utilizing all of the same components from our race winning Trophy Truck shocks with steel shock shafts, PTFE-lined spherical bearings, proprietary racing oil and high-temp Viton seals. Pair these shocks with aftermarket leaf springs and bump stop kits to unleash the SVT Raptors true off-road capabilities.

node.display_name: FOX 3.0 Factory Race Series External Bypass Piggyback QAB Shocks
node.long_desc: 3.0 steel body new, proprietary coating for improved durability;NEW, hard anodized extruded aluminum finned remote reservoir with NEW Recirculating Reservoir Bridge;Hard anodized, CNC-machined 6061-T6 billet aluminum;7/8" 17-4 H900 hard chrome plated stainless steel;Hard anodized 6061-T6 billet aluminum high flow race piston;Specific for Gen 2 Raptor to maximize performance and comfort;JM92 Advanced Suspension Fluid;Spherical, PFTE-lined, heat-treated steel bearing;Heat treated steel spherical heim mounting;Quick Adjust Bypass (QAB) adjusters;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Taking inspiration from off-road racing, the Factory Race Series rear upgrade kit for the Gen 2 Raptor utilizes the same technology and parts found on the top race-winning off-road machines, including External Bypass position-sensitive damping, Quick Adjust Bypass (QAB), and an External Cooling System (ECS2).This kit delivers the next level of off-road performance without sacrificing every day ride quality.

This modular front bumper accommodate the factory fog lights when equipped and also accommodates the OEM tow hooks. Road Armor builds this rugged beast using 11 gauge smooth steel for the outer shell, 1/4-inch gusseting and bracketry and the classic beefy Schedule 40 pipe. If this is your style but you want something a little different, a little more refined perhaps, or just want to own the baddest bumper on the market by the name the world trusts for dependability and quality, this one's for you.

node.long_desc: Handles provide a place to grip/lift the hardtop;Constructed from CNC machined extruded 6061-T6 aluminum;Black anodized finish for good looks and durability;TeraFlex logo laser etched into handles;O-ring seal prevents water leaks and wind noise;Rubber bumpers protect underside of hardtop from damage during storage and removal;Requires drilling template included
node.sales_desc: The TeraFlex JK Hardtop Handle Kit streamlines the process of removing and installing your JK Wrangler/Unlimited model's hardtop. The handles give provide a place to grip/lift the hardtop, while the rubber bumpers protect the underside of the hardtop from damage during storage and removal.

The Goodyear Excellence ROF tire offers refined handling thanks to the )E-tuned asymmetric tread design which helps provide responsive handling and a smooth touring ride. This tire also has Goodyear's RunOnFlat technology which allows for driving up to 50 miles on a delating or deflated tire at a top speed of 50 mph. The Goodyear Excellence ROF tire is perfecr for all conditions and the Ultra Wet Traction uses wide circumferential grooves to help evacuate water from beneath the tread.

Vehicles have evolved throughout the years (from sedans, to SUVs, and now the crossover utility vehicle), but have your tires done the same? The NT421Q is Nitto's premier all-season tire built specifically for your crossovers (CUV) and SUVs. From style to function, the NT421Q has been created with the foremost purpose of getting you safely to your destination throughout the seasons. The unique and stylish asymmetric tread design provides a quiet and comfortable ride while delivering all-season traction.

node.display_name: Rock Krawler Overland Series Suspension Systems
node.long_desc: Durable black powder coat finish;Solid Alloy Steel Control Arm Construction;Base System - No Shocks or Bump Stops;Best in class ground clearance and cross over angles;Made in the U.S.A;Abuse proof lifetime warranty
node.sales_desc: If your Overlanding Jeep is looking for a lift, look no further. Rock Krawler Suspensions Overland Suspension Systems are specifically designed for users with heavier accessories, camping gear, roof racks, and coolers. Overland Suspension Systems include a unique rear coil designed for increased carrying capacity for all of your heavy accessories and camping equipment but still maintain excellent driving characteristics on and off road. All Rock Krawler Suspension products are American made and backed with Rock Krawlers abuse proof lifetime warranty.

node.long_desc: Complete bolt-in system;Excellent highway ride;Improved off-road ability;Bolt-in triangulated 4 link rear;Eliminates front and rear track bar cross talk";Greatly improved rear pinion cycle with equal length rear upper and lower arms;Rear axle remains perfectly centered;Triple rate front coil springs paired with quad rate rear coils;Front and rear spring correction spring seats to minimize coil bow;Lifetime warranty on all hard parts"
node.sales_desc: The Rock Krawler JT 3.0 inch Pro-X System was specifically designed for Rubicon owners who want a complete bolt-in installation, maximum articulation from a mid-arm kit and the durability and off-road performance you expect from Rock Krawler Suspension. The triangulated 4 link rear assembly maintains the rear axle perfectly centered; allows for removal of the rear track bar, eliminates rear suspension bind, and the cross talk of the front and rear track bar arrangement greatly smoothing the highway ride. The X Factor Series adjustable lower control arms offer a total of 90 degrees of misalignment. The Triple Rate front coils paired with our Quad rate rears coils provide unmatched ride quality and off-road performance, while maintaining standard JT rear load capacities. The Rock Krawler Pro-X Gladiator Mid Arm System is the pinnacle of bolt in suspension for the JT platform.

node.display_name: Rock Krawler T-Rex Series Suspension Systems
node.long_desc: Complete Bolt in System;Excellent Highway Ride and Handling;Greatly Improved Off-Road Ability;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;Available with or without shocks
node.sales_desc: The Rock Krawler T-Rex Systems are for those Jeep o wners looking to get the best off road ability without modifying the fuel system. It features a X Factor mid arm front suspension system combined with a X Factor long arm rear system. The rear system provides the tried and true independent 3 link conversion with X2 rear suspension geometry. New high clearance axle mounts provide 3.5 inches of ground clearance under the rear axle as compared to stock. Rear upper shock relocation brackets ensure you do not loose any shock travel. The combination of high clearance mid arm front suspension and high clearance rear long arm suspension makes your Jeep tough to beat on the trails. And if the day ever comes where you want to modify the fuel system and go full long arm suspension, you have that option.

node.sales_desc: SCOSCHE suction cup MagicGrip Qi wireless mounting automatic sensing adjustable arms charger can be secured to your dashboard or window or any flat surface with the reusable stick grip suction cup base. Wirelessly charge any Qi-enabled device with up to 10-Watts of charging power, without using a charging cable plugged directly into the device. The foreign object detection makes sure that charging only activates when nothing is obstructing that area. Simply place your device near the MagicGrip charging coil and watch the arms automatically close to securely grip and charge your device. To remove your device, just gently pull it away from the charging coil area and MagicGrip will sense and open its arms back up. The mount accommodates devices up to 3.5 wide. The 360 Degree adjustable ball joint locks for secure positioning and optimal viewing from almost any angle. An ambient light sensing LED ring indicates charging and adjusts intensity in light and dark settings. A thermal management gap between the charging head and your device allows heated air to escape, promoting cooler, safer charging for your device. Compatible with your iPhone, Android and most Qi compatible devices. For iPhone 11 devices, place the MagicPlates outside of your case or in between your phone and case."

node.long_desc: Choose from HD Motor Mounts or Stock replacements;The HD have a stronger rubber and last much longer compared to stock ones;These are not cheap imitations of OEM";High quality units that have been used for years with great success;To keep rubber from deteriorating, make sure they are free of elements (oil, chemicals) and out of the sun"
node.sales_desc:
Low Range figure 80% of Suzuki's out there have at least one broken motor mount. Most the time it's the drivers side. It not only causes more vibration but robs power on take off. Get them replaced today!

Choose from their HD Motor Mounts or Stock replacements. The HD have a stronger rubber and last much longer compared to stock ones.
These are not cheap imitations of OEM" these are high quality units that they have used for years with great success. Usually the demise of motor mounts are the environment they are in. To keep rubber from deteriorating, make sure they are free of elements (oil, chemicals) and out of the sun.

Note: Alignment pins on aftermarket mounts are somewhat smaller than factory Suzuki ones. These pins are only for alignment during install and have no use after the nuts are tight. Basically you just need to hold the mounts from turning until the nuts are tight if they look like they want to spin. No big deal."

node.long_desc: Be a spectator for the Toughest One-Day Off-Road Race on the Planet without ever leaving your house;The King of the Hammers DVDs follow the teams in 'The Kingdom' as they set out to conquer harsh desert at speeds in excess of 100 mph with some of the hardest rock crawling North America has to offer;Only twenty percent of the teams that take on the green flag will make it to the end, while the rest are left scattered across the desert floor;Watch as your favorite drivers battle it out to be crowned "King" at the setting of the sun;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
King of the Hammers is considered the toughest one-day off road race in the world. It is the largest off-road race event in North America in terms of both competitors and spectators. It combines desert racing and rock crawling, and has expanded from one race to a series of 5 races held throughout the week and takes place each February in Johnson Valley, CA.

Over 130 racers and teams assembled in Johnson Valley to do battle in the desert and race for the coveted title of King" through some of the most difficult rock trails in the world, and vast expanses of harsh desert. With 160 miles between them and the checkered flag, the competition will be fierce."

node.sales_desc:
Rough Country's Winch Mount allows you to mount a standard size winch for a sleek, flush recovery solution that blends in seamlessly with the factory aesthetic.

For added convenience, each Hidden Winch Mount Kit includes a remote port allowing you to connect a wired winch remote for easy operation, with no need to fumble around underneath the vehicle.

Rough Country's Winch Mounting Kit features a 100% bolt-on installation process making it easy to upgrade your vehicle! This kit can accommodate most steel or synthetic winches and supports both hawse or roller fairleads. Upgrade your truck and be ready for recovery in an instant!

node.long_desc: Fairlead mounts and brackets;Synthetic and cable options;;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc: Road Armor is the first to create a multifaceted steel bumper design and have led the industry since 2000. There are a lot of other manufacturers on the market these days, and they encourage you to learn the difference - The Road Armor difference - because not all replacement bumpers are created equal. There's no substitute for the Original Road Armor Bumpers, 100% Made in Texas, USA.

node.long_desc: .120 wall steel tubing;Accommodates 4 - 6" round lights;Lights sold separately;Fully bolt-on;Made in the USA"
node.sales_desc: This Add-On Hoop brings the ability to mount four additional 6 round lights to your ADD front bumper. The hoop is constructed from .120" wall tubing and maintains the same low profile look that the bumper has without it. Installation is simple and can be completed in just minutes. As always, this product is made in America."

node.long_desc: Prevents suspension from dipping to lowest point;Less turbulent, more comfortable ride;Prevents damage to undercarriage;Controls final 3-inches of travel;Carburized Alloy Housing;Threaded design;Rebuildable
node.sales_desc:
Give your Jeep the ultimate off-road damping with Rough Country's Threaded Hydraulic Bump Stops. Your Jeep's factory bump stops simply aren't equipped to handle the intense force that can be applied in aggressive off-road scenarios. This pair of high-end, hydraulic bump stops feature a mixture of advanced suspension fluid and compressed Nitrogen to control the final inches of suspension travel providing a cushioned response during off-road travel. An Internal Floating Piston (IFP) in the shaft separates the oil and nitrogen to prevent cavitation.

Designed with lifted vehicles in mind, Rough Country's Threaded Hydraulic Bump Stops help prevent damage to your undercarriage by preventing your suspension from bottoming out. The result is a less jarring, more comfortable ride quality over rocky trails and uneven terrain. The threaded body allows you to adjust the mounting height to fine-tune when the bump stop engages during up travel.

Each bump stop is fully serviceable and rebuildable for a long lifespan of turbulence control. Sold as a pair!

node.long_desc: Replaces sagging factory springs;Resistant to bowing;Maintains better ride quality and performance
node.sales_desc: Rough Country's Coil Spring Replacement Kit offers greater deflection for a smoother, more consistent ride quality with the ability to handle more weight and load than the factory coil springs. With an increased linear rate design, this spring replacement kit provides a more controlled and predictable ride quality when compared to stock components. Each spring is designed to resist bowing and sagging to maintain a consistent vehicle height and ground clearance.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge HD Steel Tube Fenders
node.long_desc: Features 1.25-inch mandrel bent steel tube construction;Outer skin is laser-cut from 12-gauge steel plate;Tough satin black powder coat finish;Teflon-coated installation hardware included
node.sales_desc: Leave the pavement far behind, along with your sense of refinement, with a full set of Rugged Ridge Steel Tube Fenders. We engineered these fenders to really shine when there are rocks to climb, so we started with a burly 1.25-inch mandrel-bent steel tube frame. The fenders top skin was die-stamped and laser-cut from 12-gauge steel plate, rugged enough to survive a real-world bashing that would send a plastic fender to the trash pile. Stylized front plates, contoured base plates, as well as marker light brackets, are all CNC bent from 3mm thick steel, carrying out the tradition of being tougher than they need to be; while integrated amber LED corner lights keep things highway-friendly. Since the elements off-road can be as harsh as the terrain, we finished our JL Steel Tube Fenders with a durable satin black powder coat finish that resists rust and corrosion and looks civilized doing it. Add in Teflon-coated button head hardware with Nylock retainers and it's hard to find a more potent off-road combination. Plus, you can shake off another load of factory plastic when you add a set of Aluminum Front Inner Fenders (11615.61) to complete the look of your new fenders. Available in pairs for Front or Rear, and Full Sets. (Note: Some JL models equipped with LED Lighting package may require Tazer programming to remove a bulb-out dash warning)."

node.long_desc: Innovative stamping process delivers cutting-edge style in a lightweight bumper;Sturdy 11-gauge stamped steel construction;Tough satin black powder coat finish;Features built-in recovery hooks;Works with both factory and aftermarket hitch
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge's innovative stamping process gives the Spartacus Rear Bumper a lightweight body and a cutting-edge style unlike anything on the market today. Stamped from sturdy 11-gauge stamped steel, the Spartacus looks perfectly striking when wandering the open road, and even better off of it. But the Spartacus clearly goes beyond looking good. A tough satin black powder-coated finish resists rust, corrosion and the elements, while integrated shackle mounts add that little bit of extra insurance you need when things get deep (standard 7/8-inch D-shackle not included). To top it off, it's designed to work with factory and most aftermarket hitches, as well as factory proximity sensor systems. US Patent No. D760,133, D775,013, D800,036 & D776,582.

node.sales_desc: Lifting your Jeep JK Wrangler improves ground clearance and allows for larger tires but it can have an adverse effect on suspension and steering geometry. Now you can have your cake and eat it too, thanks to Rubicon Express best on-road performing kit the 3.5-inch JK progressive coil sport kit. This kit corrects steering and control arm geometry to eliminate bump steer and increases anti-dive for better braking and improved safety. The kit includes our new high steer kit made up of a new solid drag link that accepts OE tie rod ends while relocating the steering stabilizer above the drag link for increased ground clearance. The sport kit can improve the ride quality and handling on any 07+ JK or JK Unlimited with a 3.5-inch suspension lift.Progressive coils have a longer extended length vs. Linear coils, maximizing droop travel. The progressive spring rate also results in a smooth ride over small bumps with enough spring rate to prevent harsh bottoming during full compression.

node.sales_desc: The Waza Rotary Forged Wheel is manufactured using a highly advanced production technique called Rotary Forging. The rim of the wheels is forged at high pressure while the wheel is spun at high speed. This alters the molecular structure and enhances the strength of the alloy. The benefit is a much lighter weight than a regular cast wheel. Most importantly, the weight saving is in the outer rim of the wheel which dramatically reduces rotational mass and enhances vehicle performance.

node.long_desc: 20, 22 or 24 inch diameter;Gloss black with milled spokes;5, 6 or 8 lug bolt patterns available
node.sales_desc: The Reaper Rotary Forged Wheel is manufactured using a highly advanced production technique called Rotary Forging. The rim of the wheels is forged at high pressure while the wheel is spun at high speed. This alters the molecular structure and enhances the strength of the alloy. The benefit is a much lighter weight than a regular cast wheel. Most importantly, the weight saving is in the outer rim of the wheel which dramatically reduces rotational mass and enhances vehicle performance.

node.long_desc: 17, 18 or 20 inch diameter;Candy red, gunmetal, OD green or matte black finish available;5 lug bolt pattern
node.sales_desc: Exclusive for Jeep. The Black Rhino Recon is designed and engineered specifically to achieve the deepest concave profile possible on the Jeep Wrangler and Gladiator. The Recon wheel is a no-compromise design that is available with one width/offset configuration only; 9.5 inch wide with a -32 offset. Sizes range from 17, 18, and 20 inch diameters and are all available with the most standard finishes we have ever offered for a single design.

node.long_desc: 17, 18 or 20 inch diameter;Matte black or candy red finish;5 or 6 lug bolt pattern available
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino truck and SUV wheels lineup is built with two types of vehicles in mind: The first set-up was built with a negative offset that works perfectly with your Truck or SUV with that Extreme lift. This provides your Off Road Beast with an aggressive stance that these vehicles demand. The second is your more street friendly vehicle that you want to give that stylish look to set it apart from all other vehicles. The wheels offset is more positive and will still allow you to use it on your vehicle with a mild lift or stock appearance.

node.long_desc: 17, 18 or 20 inch diameter;Matte black or matte gunmetal finish;5 or 6 lug bolt pattern available
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Shredder is an aggressively designed off-road mesh wheel with a twisted spoke element. The Shredder features an angular concave wheel profile which further pushes the styling envelope. This off-road truck wheel is not for the faint of heart. There is no subtlety here. Black Rhino Shredder is available for 5-lug trucks and 6-lug trucks in 17 inch, 18 inch, and 20 inch sizes with offsets varying between ET-18, ET-12, ET0, and ET12. The Matte Black with Machined Dark Tint wheel finish features layered finishing on the face of the wheel to enhance the aggressive look. Brass bolts are included to make the wheel stand out. Matte Gunmetal with Black Lip Edge is also offered for a more uniform wheel finish.

node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Abrams is our newest military-inspired wheel design which is a continuation of the successful Armory and Arsenal styles. With the burliest and toughest design elements of all the Black Rhino truck wheels, it was only fitting that the Abrams wheel be named after the heavily armored M1 Abrams tank. An aggressive, deep lip is available on all 17 inch, 18 inch, and 20 inch Abrams wheel fitments to enhance the look of any heavy-duty off road truck. The Abrams is a no-compromise wheel exclusively engineered for 5x127 Jeeps and 8-lug trucks in a negative ET-18 offset only.

node.long_desc: Durable multi-stage black powder coat finish;All plate steel construction, CNC laser cut and brake-formed for a precise fit;2-way adjustable tire mount accommodates virtually any tire and wheel combination up to 40 diameter;Tire size fitment may be limited;ICON Impact products are covered by ICON's Limited Lifetime Warranty"
node.sales_desc: ICON Impact PRO Series Tire Carrier. Large spare tires can put excessive stress on the stock spare tire mount, beyond what it. The ICON Impact tire Carrier alleviates these stresses by placing the load of the spare tire's weight almost exclusively on the reinforced rear corner section of the vehicle. A Delrin alignment bushing keeps the tire carrier tightly seated when closed, for rattle-free operation. The Tire Carrier is fabricated entirely of CNC laser cut plate steel. The ICON Impact Tire Carrier is finished in a durable semi-gloss black multi-stage powder coat. Wheel with confidence knowing that ICON Impact products are covered by ICON's Limited Lifetime Warranty.

node.long_desc: Enhances the look of your truck for a true custom look;Made of Stainless Steel;Matches OEM Chrome perfectly;Installs via pre-applied Red 3M tape;New Black Platinum Design;California Residents: WARNING"

Durable multi-stage semi-gloss black powder coat finish;1/8 thick plate steel construction with 3/16" thick mounting plate or aluminum construction;High clearance design accommodates tires up to 37" with minimal lift;Multiple lengths;Fabricated design for strength and great looks;ICON Impact Series Limited Lifetime Warranty"
node.sales_desc: ICON Impact Fender Flares provide increased clearance for larger tires as well as an armored flare to withstand the rigors of heavy trail use. Flares are fabricated entirely from steel plate or aluminum, making them both stronger and better looking that old school tube style fender flares. Flares provide a larger wheel opening versus the stock plastic flares. Fender Flares are finished in a durable semi-gloss black multi-stage powder coat. Wheel with confidence knowing that ICON Impact products are covered by ICON's Limited Lifetime Warranty.

node.long_desc: Extreme Duty heavy wall DOM tube and plate steel design to withstand punishment;Durable black powdercoat finish;May be used with ICON Impact Body Armor for added body sheet metal protection;Sold as a pair or individually;ICON Impact Series Limited Lifetime Warranty
node.sales_desc: Equip your vehicle with the ultimate in hard core rocker protection with ICON Impact Rock Sliders. Dual heavy-wall DOM tubular sliders with plate steel gussets are rugged enough to bear the weight of the vehicle as it slides across the rocks and maneuvers through the tightest trail obstacles. Three heavy duty fabricated outriggers tie the slider to the frame rail and provide both vertical rigidity and lateral strength for pivoting around rocks. For an extra layer of protection, these Rock Sliders may be installed in conjunction with ICON Impact Body Armor, which acts as an exo-skin protecting the rocker sheet metal against any small rocks or branches that make it past the Rock Sliders. The sliders are finished in a durable semi-gloss black multi-stage powder coat. Wheel with confidence knowing that ICON Impact products are covered by ICON's Limited Lifetime Warranty

node.long_desc: Hugs the body to protect it with almost no inhibition of ground clearance;Lightweight, durable CNC laser cut, precision brake-formed 3/16 aluminum plate construction;Countersunk holes with flat-head fasteners for a flush, smooth installation;Stainless steel hardware provided;ICON Impact Series Limited Lifetime Warranty"
node.sales_desc: ICON Impact Body Armor protects the vulnerable rocker panel area of the body sheet metal from rocks, and trail hazards as well as gravel kicked up by the tires. It can also protect against boot scuffs on equipped with entry step-style rocker rails. Impact Body Armor is manufactured from CNC laser cut 3/16 aluminum plate which has been precision brake-formed to fit like a glove. This aluminum Body Armor is light weight, rugged and corrosion resistant. Body Armor can be installed by itself or in conjunction with OE Rubicon style rocker rails or frame-mounted rockers such as ICON Impact COMP Series Frame Mount Sliders. Stainless steel flat-head hardware is provided. ICON Impact Body Armor is finished in great looking, a durable multi-stage semi-gloss black powder coat finish. Wheel with confidence knowing that ICON Impact products are covered by ICON's Limited Lifetime Warranty."

node.long_desc: Durable black finish;Faceted high clearance design to maximize departure angle and clearance;Integrated high-clearance 2 hitch receiver with safety chain loops;Some use factory hitch;Bomb-proof 3/16" thick plate steel construction, CNC laser cut and brake-formed;Recovery shackle tabs CNC machined from 1" thick steel plate, for 7/8" shackle pin (3/4" shackle) - shackles not included"
node.sales_desc: Tackle the toughest trails with the ICON rear bumpers. Designed for the ultimate in off-road form and function, PRO Series features a multi-faceted, high-clearance design that sneaks past the tightest obstacles on the trail. These bumpers are designed with the smallest form factor possible without cutting into the vehicle rails and crossmember, ensuring great ground clearance and departure angles. Manufactured from 3/16 thick plate steel, CNC laser cut and precision brake-formed for an exact fit. If you manage to get yourself into a tight spot, recovery is aided by a pair of extreme duty recovery shackle tabs, CNC machined from beefy 1" thick plate steel. And like the rest of the ICON bumpers, even the recovery tabs are designed and placed for maximum clearance."

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Idler Arm Bracing Kits
node.long_desc: HD laser cut and NC bent steel bracket;Zinc plated for corrosion resistance;Grade 8.8 or higher JIS bolts with lock washers;Thread locker
node.sales_desc: If your idler arm isn't bent yet, it is only a matter of time before it is. Low Range Off Road has created a simple fix for a common problem. This bracket strengthens your factory idler arm by mounting behind it and bolting thought the factory idler arm bolts and nut.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Driveline Adapters and Spacers
node.long_desc: Allows a driveline to bolt directly to a Samurai t-case or pinion flange;Also for interchanging Toyota drivelines between Toyota trucks
node.sales_desc: Samurai drivelines are at best adequate in stock trim. When turning tall tires behind low gears, stock drivelines become the weak link. One solution is to use Toyota Pickup drivelines instead. Even if you have to have the Pickup shafts shortened, this is still a more economical alternative to custom-made drivelines. This option is especially appealing to anyone doing a Toyota axle swap. In that case, you likely have the driveline that came with the axle and will only need to adapt it to fit the Samurai t-case.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Inlet Water Pipes
node.long_desc: Water inlet pipe;Replacement for cracked or leaking inlet pipes;Includes water pump o-ring
node.sales_desc: Coolant leaking under the intake manifold is likely coming from this pipe. They are especially prone to fail right after hoses are replaced. You should consider replacing with any engine rebuild.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad D-Ring Shackle Wrench Tools
node.long_desc: Loosen or tighten your old D-rings;Fits all 3/4 D-rings; Features an open slot for tightening and loosening"
node.sales_desc:
When on the trail you may not always have something readily available to loosen or tighten your old d-rings, so we created the D-Ring Wrench!

Our D-Ring Wrench features an open slot for tightening and loosening and an open end for the same. The open end helps if the D-ring has been tightened to an awkward position against your bumper and you can't get the open slot positioned quite right. Throw it in the glove box, toolbox, or wherever you keep your winch controller.
